name: Meow Master: Battle for Catnip
description: Hey there, fellow cat lovers! Get ready to become a Meow Master and fight for the ultimate prize: catnip! In this game, you'll have to use your cat-like skills to fight, run, and hide your way to the finish line, all while making sure you stay alive. Remember, you only have 9 lives!

name: Arctic 51
description: Astronaut's regular expedition turns into survival on a new planet: dig, solve physical puzzles, fight enemies, explore mysteries. Find out the reason for the disappearance of the population of an entire civilization and save the Earth.

name: Carved Out
description: Carved Out is an inn building and management game with classic cRPG inspired visuals. Carve your place to a mountain far from settlements, near to dungeons among adventurers to attract heroes travelling through the area! Rent out rooms, create amazing stone works, provide creative services.

name: Unknown FPV: Drone Simulator
description: Unknown FPV: The ultimate FPV drone simulator. Master the art of flying in a vibrant, stylized world. Realistic physics, customizable settings, and multiplayer support. Beginners learn, experts escape. Join us on the journey to make FPV simulators great again.

name: Shadow Stalker
description: An Asymmetrical Horror FPS.

name: Hole Digging Game
description: to dig a hole (or not dig a hole)

name: Jester
description:
You are Jester, the King's fool. Your goal is to collect the Element items in the middle of each rooms in all of the dungeons. To do so, you need to collect a KEY in a room to open the lock that leads to an Element item. When you get a Sword you will be able to defeat the guards, if you kill all four of them, you will get a Bonus Item.

JESTER is based on an exclusive and obscure (also lost in time) Canadian game named Le Fou du Roi, or King’s Jester, one of the games available on the Vidéoway system in the 1990s

name: Velocity Vortex
description: Velocity Vortex is a challenging fast pased Time Attack Platformer where you only have 5 seconds to finish each level. As you go through the levels the game gets faster, and as you die the game gets slower.

name: Project: Obscurion
description: Project: Obscurion is an immersive spot-the-difference horror game. Use security cameras to explore detailed locations and uncover hidden anomalies. Test your perception and unravel the truth in this captivating horror experience.

name: Roly Poly Putt
description:
Platforming meets mini-golf in this wacky physics-based 3D platformer. You control Roly Poly through a myriad of levels spanning diverse landscapes in a game of miniature golf…except YOU are the ball!
Maneuver around tight corners, jump over treacherous pits, zip through dark tunnels, and other obstacles by tilting your device to each side. Your goal is to get to the flag at the end of each level with as few strokes as possible, but don’t forget to collect as many sugar cubes along the way as you can!

name: Pit Stop Racing: Club Vs. Club
description:
Easy! Intense!
Have fun with 'One Touch Racing'
Discard the hard control system of the existing racing game, and play the race by matching the timing.
The control system is as easy for a 3 -year-old, but the judgment is narrow and so it requires a high degree of concentration.
Win the winners in each tournament in order, and become the best racer !

name: Galacdrive
description:
Dodge asteroids, fight bosses, and use powerful abilities in Galacdrive!
Well, you did it. The enemy mothership is destroyed. But you only completed half of the mission. Not only do you need to take the deadly warp lane home, but you also need to fend off all the ships hunting your bounty. Will you make it home and what will you encounter along the way?

name: Piggy Piggy: Boom
description: Try getting Piggy Piggy safe across to the other side of the level. Always stay on the path or bad things will happen. Also be aware of the many traps and enemies that are luring around.

name: Sloomy
description:
Super-fast, crazy-addictive and mega-exciting! Play your way through bee-autiful gardens full of colorful flowers! Harvest floweres as mush as you can before the night comes down.
How many flowers can you harvest in just 60 seconds?

name: Slidercrash
description: Experience a brand new puzzle-challenge: Slidercrash. Combine Sliders of the same color on a carefully designed retro playing-field. But the devil is in the details. Mirrors and rails redirect the Sliders, walls and rocks stop them, minds or the abyss let them meet their maker. And then there are the other Sliders…

name: Croaked
description: Help the undead frogs get to safety in this devastated world filled with treacherous lava pits and fire-breathing dragons.

name: The Many Sins of House Ocampo
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Surfer
description:
This game reacts to your ambient noise! Play ‚Sonic Surfer‘ when you ride the bus, at the park, in a waiting line or at other places where noise in different soundlevels occurs.
Surf the waves and don't fall off your board! Can you collect enough suns to stop the moonrise?

name: Snake Crayon Run
description: From Classic Snake game to Endless Running game with Colorful themes, break color blocks, and challenge your finger skill to survive.

name: Steep: X Games Pack
description: Welcome to the X Games, the world's most famous winter sports freestyle competition. Grab your board and your ski's and travel to Alaska's spectacular snowparks where you'll discover new events, new moves, and a whole new level of competition. Includes 90's and Rocket Wings DLC.

name: Viral Days
description:
Heal. Protect. Prevent.
Take good care of people as they walk the streets of your town. As your area is plagued by a new virus, you have to distribute masks, enforce social distancing, quarantine infected persons, and impose lockdowns from time to time.

name: Total Tiki-Taka
description:
A one touch endless football game based on combined styles of Total football and Tiki-Taka.
Total Tiki-Taka is a fast paced, fresh take on football games. With combined elements of Tiki-Taka soccer and Total football, this game will stretch your concentration powers to the limit.
Take control of your favorite teams and master the art of passing in this frantic passing game. Total Tiki-Taka puts you on the football training grounds where real players are made. Keep passing the ball among the players to keep the session going and bettering your score. Like Total football, the players will keep changing their positions so keep an eye out on their movements.

name: The Wanderer
description:
A fresh look at the myth of Frankenstein
Play as the Creature, a wanderer without memory or past, a virgin spirit in a completely fabricated body. To forge the destiny of this artificial being who is ignorant of both Good and Evil, you will have to explore the vast world and experience joy and sorrow.

name: Letter To A Friend
description: Letter To A Friend is a short first-person experience by Christoph Frey about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station. Its visual references come from expressionistic silent movies and old analog recordings. The game was made in 48 hours during Asylum Jam 2015 and is a proof of concept regarding the visual aesthetics and atmosphere.

name: GlowBoard: WinterFest
description: Sin descripción

name: Puppy Moon
description:
Dogs in space! Dogs in space!
An adorable dog is jumping on the moon looking for its missing master.
Jump further and further!
Collect coins, bones and complete the missions to unlock more dogs.

name: Lazy Master
description:
Right now! It takes only 5 minutes!
Log in and grab various rewards that await you!
It’s so easy upgrading your heroes in Lazy Master!

name: Idle Military Factory Tycoon
description:
As workstations are built, you will grow your business and raise even more cash.
Automate the workflow by hiring operators so that products are automatically sold.
Hire the best operator, manage your money and become a great manager.

name: Rocket Crane
description:
Rockets are cool...
Cranes are cool...
How about a Rocket powered Crane?...Bring it on!
Master the art of flying a Rocket Crane, then use your skill to solve complex construction puzzles.

name: Magic Stone Knights
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure of destiny with unique and charming allies!

name: Guitar Hero 7
description: Guitar Hero 7 is a cancelled 7th entry in the Guitar Hero series.

name: Cursed to Golf
description: Cursed to Golf is a 2D golf-like adventure about surviving through golfing purgatory. With rogue-like elements and Metroid-like hole layouts, can you ascend?

name: Muppets Sorting and Ordering
description: Sorting & Ordering is a Muppet Kids CD-Rom game produced by Brighter Child in 1997. This game is volume 6 in the Muppet Kids Reading and Thinking Series.

name: MonoGolf
description:
Monogolf is a mini golf game where your objective is to get the ball in the hole in just one hit. If you don't, you'll lose a heart. You start the game with only 10 hearts, so you'll have to make sure you don't lose too many or else you'll lose the game.

To hit the ball in Monogolf, all you have to do is slide your finger back to adjust the power and the direction of your hit. Before you let go, you'll have to keep a couple important factors in mind, like the different surfaces the ball will roll over and how that will affect your shot, or the walls it can bounce off of, and so on.

In Monogolf, you'll find more than 100 different levels which you can unlock as you beat the easier levels in the beginning. Each time you beat a level, you'll get some orange hexagons (the game's currency) that you can then use to increase the maximum number of lives you have or get other useful abilities.

If 100 levels isn't enough, there's also a scenario editor so you can create your own. Once you create a level, you can send it to the developers on Twitter. The best ones will appear in the game.

Monogolf is an excellent mini golf game with nice graphics, relaxing music, and a simple, fun, and addictive gameplay.

name: ReplaceR
description: It's a 2D action shooting adventure game where you switch between multiple guns and use interchangeable gimmicks to try to break through the stages! What awaits you in a mysterious facility in a corner of the universe?

name: TimeQuake
description: Time is your weapon in this online PVP first-person team shooter. Opposing factions bend time to take out opponents, complete objectives and dominate the battlefield.

name: Tribute
description: Tribute is a 3v3 battle arena with the core gameplay built around on-field heroes switching, strategic points capturing, and lane-pushing control.

name: Pixel Disc Golf 2
description: The disc golf phenomenon of the 2014 is now back and better than ever!

name: Holiday Dash!
description:
You've been waiting all year to open presents and the time is finally near. Now, the only obstacle remaining is to return home.
Run, jump, and ride your sleigh as fast as you can while slinging snowballs, because it’s a guarantee someone or something will stand in your way! Can you make it home?

name: Mahjong Yin And Yang
description: In the ancient Chinese philosophy of Yin and Yang has always symbolized the light and dark, hard and soft. Mahjong Yin and Yang you will find symbolize characters. Chips Water and Fire, rain and snow, as well as other pieces will pleasantly surprise you. Great atmosphere, nice music it's nice to spend time with the game Mahjong Yin Yang

name: Halloweeen!
description: Innovative two-button platformer that starts dead simple, but gets devilishly hard! Upgrade your abilities, unlock new candies, enemies, streets and hats as you go trick or treating. Can you level-up to 20 and beat your friends on the Game Center leaderboards?

name: Zombie TD
description: Zombie TD pits you against wave after wave of zombies. Build, maintain and upgrade towers to hold off the zombie hordes over the course of 4 grueling days. The game is set in city streets and the player must construct towers to fend off wave after wave of zombie. Each tower can be equipped with a variety of weapons. The further the player makes it in the game, the better the weapons (anything from arrows to grenade launchers). Just as the weapons get better, so do the zombies. The difficulty level grows as the game goes on and so must the players ability to work with the tools and weapons given to him or her.

name: UFB 2: Fight & Wrestling Games
description: The Ultra Fighting Bros have company in UFB 2! Discover the all-new CAREER mode and fight your way in 50 bone-breaking challenges and combats against fighters from all around the world. The greatly improved multiplayer mode is also sure to get you and your friends hooked from the first punch. Step inside the arena, it’s time to fight!

name: Block Racer
description: Can you beat all your friends and show them who is the retro arcade hero.

name: My Land
description: My Land is a farming simulation game from the maker of My Planet, My Business Empire, and My Colony. You begin the game with a blank plot of land and 00. From there, it is up to you to make it your own. You can create a farm with crops and animals, or you can create a commerce area with side walks and pizza stands, or you can create a nature park with lakes and trails. The choice is yours!

name: Flying Car Transport Simulator
description: Drive hi-tech flying cars in the all-new exciting car driving simulator game. Drive fast cars down city streets or fly high in the sky above the city like an airplane. Help pick up taxi fares in the latest in taxi driving experiences, fly passengers in style in the best of flying cars. The latest in driving and flying simulations with one of the best flying car games on the store!

name: AFPS: Airplane Flight Pilot Sim
description: Take flight in real airplanes across the massively detailed open-world flight simulator. Explore sceneries and airports in high resolution with satellite maps, 3D buildings, runways, air traffic, weather conditions, and true volumetric clouds.

name: Pixsteps: Gamified Pedometer
description:
Get ready to step into a cozy world with Pixsteps, the pedometer that mixes activity with creativity.
Take charge of your very own Garden, a special place that blooms and grows with every step you take. Whether you're walking or running, each little step will bring new life to your plants, animals, and rewards. Get Pixsteps and kickstart a virtuous cycle of wellness and healthy habits!

name: Neon Flytron: Cyberpunk Flight
description:
Find yourself driving a flying car, speeding through the cyberpunk city!
Dive into this fascinating neon world! Dodge traffic and moving bridges, fly between trains, and through giant fans. Use a shield to avoid obstacles. Watch neon signs passing by your side, while you rush forward.
Many dangers lie ahead, but you can do it! Prove yourself and become the best pilot in cyberpunk city!

name: Drift Car Driving Simulator
description:
Take control of some amazing drift cars (speed car, SUV and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains : more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads !
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

name: Cliff Drift
description:
Thrilling racing, Cliff Drift!
Drive with the faulty steering wheel and enjoy the pleasure of cliff racing.
Drive carefully, don't fall off the cliff!
Very easy control!
Try to the challenge sports cars, trucks and police cars!

name: Drifty Chase
description: Imagine that you just robbed a bank and the police is on your tail. Jump into a car and try to shake off the pursuit! This game is not about racing, it’s about drifting with a trunk full of cash through an insanely crowded city! You are being chased by the police that wants to get back each cent from the stolen money bag. Don’t let them take it back from you! Test your skills, drift across the city and find out if you can be faster than them. Let the drifty chase begin!

name: Speed Kayak
description:
Control your kayak and go as far as you can!
Achieve the highest score you can!

name: Iron Runner Robot
description:
Check out this fun and futuristic Iron robot running game.
Run, jump and shoot energy balls with this this fun running game. Fun for all ages and a blast to play.

name: Race Day
description:
Race against friends or random opponents!
Race Day is a fun and physics based real-time multiplayer racing game. Compete with up to four players for the top spot. Races are short and intense, perfect for a quick multiplayer game whenever you have a short break! Increase your skill level to unlock new cars and addons.

name: Return of the Ancients
description: A mod for Subnautica which brings quite a few ancient wonders back to life, with more lurking beyond what little you can see...

name: Slime Roll
description:
Our game, developed for the Mini Jam, embraces the theme of Fusion and incorporates the required limitation of "Control the Environment." In this fast-paced and creative adventure, players will dive into a world where the fusion of objects and abilities takes center stage.

As the player explores various levels, they will encounter unique objects and elements that can be fused together to create powerful synergies. With the ability to control the environment, players can manipulate and combine these objects to overcome obstacles and navigate through challenging puzzles.

To navigate the game world, players will utilize the classic WASD controls for movement, providing a smooth and intuitive experience. Additionally, they will harness the power of fusion through the use of special abilities. Pressing the spacebar allows the character to perform a dynamic jump, while the Q key activates a heavy ability with tremendous impact. For explosive situations, players can unleash the fused power by pressing the E key.

Our game truly embodies the theme of Fusion by emphasizing the combination of objects and abilities to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. With the limitation of "Control the Environment," players are encouraged to think creatively and strategically to manipulate their surroundings and forge their path to victory.

Join us in this thrilling adventure, where fusion and environmental control are the keys to success. Can you master the art of fusion and conquer the challenges that lie ahead? Get ready to experience a game that pushes the boundaries of creativity and control in the Mini Jam!

name: Drainscape
description: Drainscape is a vertical action adventure with roguelite elements, where you must survive your fall through a drain filled with obstacles and enemies with only an umbrella to save you.

name: Solar Descent
description:
Solar Descent is a WIP action-adventure game (playable tech demo available below) for the Playdate handheld console in the vein of classic The Legend of Zelda games combined with modern ideas found in e.g. Dark Souls and Hollow Knight.

Solar Descent features real-time combat, two attack buttons, on the fly switching of abilities, clever combat integration of the crank, elaborate menus and map systems.

name: Gunfight
description: Gunfight is an unofficial port of the classic Atari VCS game where a cowboy at either side of the screen, moving up and down for the Sinclair ZX81.

You are free to choose your gender as well as your species, which ranges from Human, Canine, Feline, Avian, Dragon and Fae. You will meet many characters, most of which anthropomorphic in your adventure who you may befriend or seek a deeper connection with. There are multiple romance options not bound by species or gender.

name: Oddrietta
description: 3 days ago, 22 year old Henrietta was getting ready for work when she received a message from her mother: "Don't go out, the wind is changing people...". A mysterious wind appeared out of nowhere and if someone listens to it, they start to change: some get holes and pimples all over their body, some become grotesque abominations. Henrietta became deaf after a car accident 9 years ago, so she isn't affected by the wind... but she can't stay home forever. What's going on out there? What is that wind? Is Henrietta's mother okay?

Compete with other players.

Sweep throw newspaper.

Build your own castle defense and protect the Knights from the evil Lizardmen!
It’s Siegecraft built from the ground up for TD fans!

name: High Like a Fly

It probably looks like yet another Flappy Bird clone, but in this game you navigate the fly by swiping your finger instead of tapping.
It is much more difficult than it seems.

name: Golem Arcana
description: Golem Arcana offers a whole new way to play tabletop games by harnessing the power of your smartphone or tablet. As you play, the app serves as a sort of referee and rulebook, freeing up the players to concentrate on devising strategies to crush their enemies and give grief to their friends on the other side of the table. Thus, Golem Arcana combines the tactile fun of a tabletop game with the accessibility of an online game. It’s the best of both worlds, offering up a unique experience that neither could deliver on its own.

name: Floodrush
description:
8 Seekers rush to collect treasure and battle for supremacy! Choose from 3 Seekers, summon a rowdy crew, and dominate the island before it sinks. Surprise your foes by casting rum bombs, nets and exploding watermelons.
Mobilize troops like the muscular Boxer Crab, or invest in heavy troops like the mighty Lava Rex. Swarm and overwhelm others with Pistol Fish, Raptors, and more! Find higher tier cards to build an unstoppable force.

name: Eternal Destiny
description: Eternal Destiny (Or just Destiny) is a first-person shooter originally released on Risc PC (Acorn) machines. You play through a variety of Egyptian, High-Tek Japanese, and Manga-themed levels, discovering power cells and unravelling the story, which revolves around a Time Travel.

name: Speed X: Extreme 3D Car Racing
description:
Speed X: Extreme 3D Car Racing is one of the most exciting and action-packed 3D Racing Games that allows you to fulfill your most ambitious racing desires! This game lets you steer your car at unimaginable speed, giving you the heart pumping and enthralling experience that you’ve always dreamt of.
The Game consists of 15 different Tournament races and Sprint Rounds, offering you a variety of challenges. The more you win, the more you earn. Outpace your opponents and enhance your racing skills. You can also brag about your advanced driving skills via the Leader boards through Game Center.
You will be rewarded with in-Game Cash on winning races that you can gather to unlock more in the Game. Users who are passionate about racing can use In-App purchase options to gain more points and challenge any race Opponents which they want.

name: Gravity Still Sucks!
description: Last year, Gravity Sucked. Guess what? Gravity still sucks!

name: PixelMogul
description:
As the PixelMogul you will start small with a single, simple building but, you know, one day you could own the whole town! It all depends on your talent and fortune as a landlord!
Buy buildings, choose interiors and maintain your apartments in tip top shape to find and keep suitable tenants. But be warned: Only happy tenants will stay put and pay their rent. And only happy tenants will enable you to buy more buildings and expand your real-estate empire!

name: Skate Jam
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to be a pro skater? Have you attempted to land new combo tricks and tough grinds? What about warming up for skate competitions? Look no further.

Skate Jam is the ultimate professional skateboarding game designed to master your wildest skate tricks!

Explore different skate parks, unlock new boards and compete in global Skate Jam tournaments to become a skate legend.

name: Beast League
description:
A multiplayer sports battle arena where you can defy gravity! Compete in fast-paced 2-minute airborne matches and unlock powerful Beasts with unique super powers.
Experience the first mode of Beast League: Basketball. The ultimate mobile PvP multiplayer basketball game! Control your shots with precision and make insane dunks and layups as you dominate the court. Defy gravity with Nitro Boots, fly and spin in the air as you outplay and defeat your enemy.
Unlock and upgrade a variety of Beasts unique play styles and ultimate abilities! Collect awesome skins to stand out in the field. Battle until the last Beast stands, each time you score your enemy loses HP!

name: Dig Odyssey: Cosmic Mining
description:
Explore the depths of a distant planet as a space miner in this exciting digging game! Dig deep and uncover valuable metals and precious gems as you search for the source of a mysterious signal.
A mysterious signal was received from the depths of the nearest exoplanet to Earth. An experienced miner was sent to investigate it. He has to become an astronaut and uncover the mystery of the signal.
Are you ready for an exciting adventure? Your task is to dig the soil and penetrate deeper and deeper until you find the source of the signal. The planet's crust consists of several layers of varying hardness, the mine contains many different metals and precious stones. Collect them - they are needed for crafting and upgrading equipment.
You have to dig quickly as you have a limited supply of oxygen! Improve your tools (pickaxe, drill, dynamite, etc.) to dig even faster!
With a limited supply of oxygen and challenging terrain to navigate, can you become the fastest ground digger and solve the mystery of the signal?
Best of luck!

name: Squish Run
description: Welcome to the Squish Run! Are you quick enough to punch and run your way to the goal before a pointy wall of doom ends your day?

name: Card Lords
description: Construct your dream deck from an amazing hoard of magical Creatures and Heroes in trading card game (TGC). Dozens of cards to collect with various qualities and abilities. Easy to pick gameplay with deep strategy ensured! Challenge yourself and other players in PvP Arena and try to be the best TCG card collector!

name: RoundRick: Brick Breaker
description:
Round Rick: Brick Breaker game takes on the gameplay mechanic of the classic arcade hits Super Breakout or Arkanoid games while, at the same time, injects new features, mechanics and elements which will revolutionise the standard of arcade brick breaker games.

Swipe the screen to draw a line to let the marble bounce. Don't let the marble fall down our of the screen. Remember to swipe and draw!

name: Drifty
description:
Master the art of the drift!
Burn rubber on the city streets, kick up the dust in the desert and slide sideways through the Asian landscape. Make your way through the career or drift to the top of the leaderboards while earning many new cars, wheels and attributes.

name: Woodla: The Tower
description: Woodla: The Tower - the first game of Woodla augmented reality game series. Explore the world around you. Collect magical sets to get powerful spells. Fight the Astral creatures. Collaborate with your friends helping each other to progress. Go deeper in the Great Tower worlds to find the evil source and eliminate it.

name: Bum Fights
description:
Get ready to brawl like never before in Bum Fights! Jump into the ultimate online multiplayer top-down shooter set in a nostalgic medieval world, where you rise from rags to riches as a penniless warrior fighting for survival and glory.

Experience fast paced action and intense combat as you battle other players in the arena, or team up to take on hordes of the undead. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, from rusty knives to throwing rocks, and fight until you're the last one standing.

But beware: the competition is fierce, and only the strongest and most skilled will emerge victorious. With customizable characters and diverse game modes, there's always a new challenge around the corner.

Gear up for battle and enter the arena to prove your worth as the Lord of the Bums!

name: Aqua Ippan
description: Heavily inspired by arcade games from the 90s, Aqua Ippan is a ‘Shoot’em Up’/platformer game currently in development that can be played by one or two player(s). Despite being a modern game, it feels and plays like a true arcade classic, and pays homage to the Metal Slug series with its artstyle, detailed animations and jazz-fusion music.

name: Cosmo Knight Zion
description: The project involves significant changes in the story to create an original plot, as well as improvements to the game engine, the addition of new elements and improvements to the controls, changes in the levels, characters and enemies, and modifications to the music. Although the project is still in its early stages of development, I hope to work on it until it becomes a completely new and complete game.

name: Shape Shifter
description: Experience heart-pumping arcade shooter action. Each combat presents a new challenge as you adapt to a different ship with a unique way to play. Dodge an onslaught of bullets, blast through enemies, and shapeshift your way to victory.

name: Back Fire
description:
A standard horizontal shoot'em up. The main weapon can be powered-up to provide faster and more powerful shots. Weapons such as lightning or three-way shots appear as power-ups. There are 18 levels to complete the game. If you use a credit to continue in levels 14 through 18, you will start back at level 13.

This game is a prototype or had a limited release.

name: Back to Medieval Village
description: Sin descripción

name: Dynasty of Shadows
description: Sin descripción

name: Legends of Haired Pyra
description: Legends of haired Pyra is multiplayer game endless runner.

name: Sphizofrenia: Concept of Horror
description: Sphizofrenia is a concept of horror.

name: Cute Kitty
description: Sin descripción

name: Just do It
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunny Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Red Riding Rogue
description:
Dear Little Red,
Stay on the path and be wary, for the woods are not filled with friends.
Orcs, and wolves are some of the dangers ahead.
The forest is endless and you will get no help.
Be careful, because when slaying monsters you become one yourself.
Yours truly,
Grandma Red

name: SupaSupaCross
description: SupaSupaCross is an arcade style racing game where riders tap, tilt, and turbo-boost their way to the finish line. Be a SupaSupa star as you race across ten exciting stadium levels and increasingly difficult series challenges. A nostalgic top-down racing experience full of fun tracks, boost pads, slow-downs, and SupaSupa offroad action.

name: Snappy Chicks: Flappy Friends
description:
Rescue baby chicks by making pictures of you and your family in the photo library, and those of your Facebook friends jump into the game themselves!!
The joyful imagination will come true.

name: Mystery Mansion
description: Escape from the haunted house.

name: The Yakyuken: Ojousama
description: Strip rock-paper-scissors game featuring Yumi Hirai, Mika Akimoto, Hisae Morita, Mako Kimiya

name: The Yakyuken: Blonde-hen
description: Strip rock-paper-scissors game featuring Nataly Field, Orty Micnen, Jackline Obear, and Jessica Perfort.

name: The Yakyuken: Bodicon
description: Strip rock-paper-scissors game featuring Jun Yahagi, Noriko Akikawa, Yuka Okazaki, and Yuki Azusa.

name: The Yakyuken: Companion
description: Strip rock-paper-scissors game featuring Show Takizawa, Chisato Asamiya, Natsuko Kayama, and Izumi Teraski.

name: The Yakyuken: Bunny Girl
description: Strip rock-paper-scissors game featuring Hitomi Yuki, Ena Nakagami, Eimi Matsushita, and Mizuho Toyoda.

name: My Dear Hatchet Man
description:
Realistically, nothing bad ever happens in the woods, right?
Put all your guards down, and enjoy your time with a friendly stranger, who might have had developed a thing for you!

name: 14 Days With You
description: "14 Days With You" is an 18+ romance/horror visual novel centred around Ren; a mysterious individual who seems more than obsessed with you — and is willing to do anything he can to have you.

name: Catography
description: Catography is a collectathon platformer, with a cute and cosy aesthetic, and most importantly… Filled with kittens!!! Your main and only goal consists on exploring and creating a map for this island you've just discovered. That's right, you are a cartographer cat!

name: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader - Collector’s Edition
description: This fabulous collector’s box includes an 8-inch\20cm Cassia painted figure, hardcover art book, Warrant of Trade that you can personalize with your name, Rogue Trader banner, and sticker pack. As well, all the items included in the Developer’s Digital Pack.

name: Grave Seasons
description: Grave Seasons is a supernatural murder-mystery farming simulator. Play as the new farmer in Ashenridge as you harvest crops, fish and mine, meet and romance townsfolk, build up the community... and maybe stop the murders.

name: Door of Perception
description:
Doors of perception is game from castle game jam 2016. Enjoy!
Gameplay:

name: Math Duel
description:
Two can have fun at the same time! Math Duel: 2 Player Math Game is one of those fun educational games where two players fight each other mathematically.

Test your math skills in a race against your friends! The screen is split in two thus very convenient for the duel games. This is a concentration game that stirs your brain in a positive way. Multiplayer games are in right now, and this is the best game to play with friends.

name: General Knowledge Quiz
description: At what level do you think your general knowledge is? Here's a fun way to find out! This GK quiz contains a bunch of trivia knowledge questions and answers from different categories and fun facts for every single quiz question you answer. Whether it's geography quiz, history trivia game or sports quiz questions that you prefer - this GK quiz trivia game includes all of them stack into one unique world general knowledge game. One thing is for sure: you won't get bored answering those quick general knowledge trivia questions.

name: Madness in the Dark
description: There is almost no light in the game. A shot briefly illuminates the room and slows down time, giving you a chance to aim and eliminate the threat. And remember, every shot must be reasonable. After all, there are few bullets, and noise can attract truly dangerous patients.

name: A Crazy Guy
description: With my hammer, my chainsaw and my boomstick, I'll take out all the old men and their mangy dogs... and some bizarre creatures.

name: Bounty Hunter
description: "Bounty Hunter" is a card-based roguelite dungeon crawler. Navigate through various decks with enemies, traps and puzzles using guns, items and upgrades bought at a dive bar game hub that’s a front for a crime syndicate. Meet interesting characters, rise in guild ranks and experience the story.

name: Terrierble Logic
description: A game of logic, dogs, and questionable puns. Using the clues given, you'll arrange the elements and solve more than 75 puzzles that range from simple logic to fairly challenging. It is family-friendly and a fun way to engage with thinking in a logical way.

name: Echoes of the Forgotten
description: A psychological horror game set in the abandoned town of Whisper Hollow. Explore, solve puzzles, and uncover the dark secrets of the town while managing your sanity. Play with friends in various multiplayer modes, including co-op investigations and ghost vs. investigator.

name: Louloudi Asteri: Save the Solar System
description: "3D STG with a 2D feel! Join the adventure to save the solar system! Ace pilots Louloudi & Asteri fight a massive virus. Twin-stick controls, sidestep & roll, dodge enemy attacks. Shield-life system for beginners; damage auto-recovers. Normal & Hard routes for all players!"

name: 9 Lives
description: After living on a crisis striken city, you receive a letter inviting you to join a cat rescue at the Muur Islands. Grow medicinal plants, craft medicine, diagnose symptoms, establish relationships with the island's inhabitants, explore the island and untangle every mystery it has to offer.

name: A Cairn Tale
description: A Cairn Tale is a 3rd person mountaineering adventure game in which you explore monumental and dreamlike environments through the seasons.

name: Antivine
description:
Antivine is like a delicate album and a peaceful composition. Describing a young boy seeking for the reason of his uniqueness, and step on his journey. With your wisdom can help him to pursue and reveal the truth.

Some say once you get order, branches will start to sprout out of the body and become a plant. Find the mountain God at the other side of the land, and you will find the cure.

Change the scenes with a simple click. One of the core of Antivine is to change viewpoints, and clear all the puzzles with it.

"Who am I? Why am I different?"
In this game, you can enjoy solving puzzles in a relaxing pace and together with a young girl meet on the journey. Put yourself in a teeming world and find the answer of life.

name: Elon Simulator VR
description: Elon Simulator is an immersive VR Billionaire Simulator with tons of fun mechanics and activities. As Elon, you can: Smoke Weed (a lot), Print your own Money, Buy Private Islands, Sell Lithium to Earth for Billions, Make Millions while you sleep in real life, Become a Trillionaire, and Tons more!

name: Tennis In Hell
description: Tennis In Hell - Top Down is a game about tennis where the player must hit all the balls towards the opponent while he is trying to do the same, the more balls the players miss, the less health points they will have.

name: Shadowfall
description: "Shadowfall" is an action-packed RPG set in a world of magic and myth. Play as Kael, a young hero on a quest to save the kingdom of Arvandor from a looming darkness. With 20 unique character classes to choose from and immersive storytelling, this game offers a truly unforgettable experience.

name: Epidemic Escape: A Race for the Cure
description: Fight to survive and find the components of the cure as you race against the clock through hospitals to escape infected zombies. This single player, action-based, survival, role-playing puzzle game will have you frantically avoiding zombies, solving unique puzzles, and racing against the clock.

name: Reikon: Reawaken
description: Reikon: Reawaken is a story-driven action-adventure game. Master your technique with the mysterious sword and unravel the secrets it holds.

name: Rose and Lotus: Petals of Memories
description: [Rose and Lotus:Petals of Memories] is based on Korean traditional fairy tales 'Janghwa, Hongryeon'.The main character, Rose, awake from the cold floor without her memory.Find the truth behind the dark mansion and get out of it with your sister Lotus.

name: Head Hunters
description: Head Hunters is a top-down extraction shooter. Control soldiers manually or use demonic possession to command a full squad of AI soldiers at once. Explore solo through a rich player-choice driven story campaign, or team up with friends in Co-Op multiplayer to stake your claim as a Lord of Hell!

name: Enigma Manor
description: Enigma Manor is a 1-4 player co-op survival horror game. Navigate your way through the procedurally generated manor, fend off monsters, solve puzzles and find a way to escape.

name: LogiGolf
description: LogiGolf is a peaceful minigolf-themed puzzle game. Place blocks to build the course in order to score a hole-in-one!

name: Otto Roof
description: Coming out on the roof at night, it is not known what can be found there...

name: Monch!
description: Monch your way to new abilities as you platform and puzzle your way through a colourful, handcrafted world. The Monchling is hungry for adventure!

name: Crazy Rabbits
description: Crazy Rabbits is a chaotic multiplayer FPS, you play as a rabbit with speed running abilities. you can play with up to 15 people.

name: Pallet
description: In Pallet, a sokoban game, you need to tidy up your warehouse across several dozen of levels. Every puzzle mechanics will challenge your mind, especially if you are a logisitc lover.

name: Zombreak: The Last Escape
description: Zombreak is a zombie survival, rogue-lite, top-down shooter. As a last hope of survival, you must navigate through a dangerous world, filled with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies, deadly traps, and valuable resources to scavenge. You'll need to strategize and plan your escape carefully.

name: Shining Symbol
description: This is a galactic castlevania-type game, based on the design of four elephants and twenty-eight stars as the boss, four scenes, five attribute skills, and a variety of gem abilities waiting for you to unlock.

name: Liberta: Rise of Freedom
description: Deep into the dungeons of Bleakmoore , you'll face hordes of enemies in each room , you'll build a unique character each time you die, play with different skills, weapons, and items. Level up as you collect loot to become even more powerful. Fans of FPS action-RPG gameplay will love Liberta:ROF.

name: Kind Nature
description: Kind Nature is a post-apocalyptic roguelike deckbuilding game. As one of the last survivors in a harsh world, you'll embark on dangerous missions to gather resources, fight enemies, and expand your camp. In this shattered world, will you find a place to call home?

name: Beta Decay
description: The development of positronic propulsion technology has granted the ability for mankind to travel beyond the Sol system, to its neighboring star system, Alpha Centauri. Survive in the new frontier amongst an exponential uprising of mega-corporations, factions, and syndicates.

name: One-Eyed Likho
description:
One-Eyed Likho is a grim first-person horror adventure set in a world inspired by a dark, Slavic fairy tale “The One-eyed Likho”. Likho, is an embodiment of evil fate and misfortune in Slavic mythology, a creature with one eye, often depicted as an old, skinny woman in black.

Embark on an exhilarating journey through a haunting realm brought to life from a forgotten Slavic fairy tale of the 19th century. Immerse yourself in a captivating world rendered in mesmerizing greyscale, presented in an immersive 4:3 aspect ratio that adds depth to your adventure.

name: The Fifth Rite
description: In the Fifth Rite, uncover the mystery behind strange occurrences in the city as a detective. Face off against the powerful cult leader and their followers, as well as supernatural entities, to save the city from their grasp.

name: Nobody's Left
description: In a post-war apocalyptic city, ordinary men can no longer remain ordinary, adaptation is a survival must to protect your loved ones. take responsibility and lead this change in a game with emotional storytelling. remember! always expect the unexpected when nobody’s left to back you up!

name: Ottopunks: Gangs of Bosphorus
description: Ottopunks is an Isometric Action RPG in a vibrant Ottoman Punk World inspired by anime, comic books, arts and street culture. Solve mysteries, defeat enemies and try to survive in this chaotic world.

name: Backrooms VS
description: Ever dreamt of chasing your friends in a backrooms style game? Ever wanted to be the entity in the backrooms? Ever had the thought "I wonder what fear looks like in VR"? Well, this is the game for you. Backrooms VS has all that and MORE. With plenty of game modes for a night's worth of fun.

name: Maveldor: Saga of the Twin Mirrors
description: Dive into Maveldor, an action-packed gauntlet arcade-style game! Test your skills as you dodge enemies at Crabblerog Beach, battle snarglerogs in Thistlemore Valley, and uncover hidden treasures in this thrilling top-down adventure. Help save Maveldor!

name: SteelRacer
description: Join the ultimate battle in an abandoned steel work factory. In this fast-paced multiplayer game, you'll take control of a powerful car armed with a variety of weapons, from machine guns to rocket launchers, and face off against other players from around the world.

name: Destroy the Wall
description: A 2D metroidvaina action game with a unique control scheme. Guide a snake constantly chasing your cursor--but be sure not to let them touch. Explore the decaying landscape of a condemned world and fight its monsters so you can grow strong enough to destroy the wall that always holds you back

name: Bow Hunter 2015
description:
Bow Hunter 2015, V4.0, is the new updated and improved version of Bow Hunter with new Camoflage features, new more realistic deer scare effects, and full tournaments for Cash, Gold, and OBuck prizes! Lots of Updates and Improvements!
Bow Hunter 2015 is a realistic simulation of deer hunting with upright bows including detailed 3d terrains, stalking hunts, treestand hunts, and regular tournaments with real cash prizes for the winning bowmen.
In the Bow Hunter 2015 simulation, the player can hunt White Tail deer, Mule deer, and Black Tail deer over a larger terrains. Players can stalk their trophies or hunt from tree stands in detailed 3D terrains using all the techniques of real bow hunting including scents, calls, camouflage, special arrows, optics, and powerful bows of the player’s choice.
The deer in the simulation are easily spooked and will run quickly from the hunter if the hunter does not use the proper bow hunting techniques. The simulation contains over 200 hunts, with increasing difficulty, requiring better and better equipment, techniques, and hunting expertise.
Players can also qualify for monthly tournaments against other hunting enthusiasts to win real world prizes like gift cards to their favorite outdoor retailer, bows, arrows, and other bow hunting accessories.
The simulation will be updated monthly with new hunts, new challenges, new weapons, and new animals to hunt regularly.

name: Farming Simulator 23 Mobile
description:
Grow crops, grow your agricultural empire! Become a modern farmer to operate more than 100 authentic machines by Case IH, CLAAS, DEUTZ-FAHR, Fendt, John Deere, KRONE, Massey Ferguson, New Holland, Valtra & many other acclaimed manufacturers from around the world - offering a wide range of farming activities.
Choose what kind of farmer you want to be in Farming Simulator 23 (FS23) as the acclaimed agricultural sim by GIANTS Software offers a brand-new experience with many new features for your mobile device!

name: Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion
description: First Studio is developing Daemon x Machina: Titanic Scion, with Kenichiro Tsukuda as its producer.

name: Rune Factory 6
description: This new entry will take place on the western continent of Adonea.

name: Story of Seasons: Project You can Play with Everyone
description: A new Story of Seasons project focused on multiplayer.

name: Story of Seasons: Project Experiences
description:
A new story of seasons game focused on "experiences".

Fans can look forward to the joy of taking care of animals, growing crops, and sharing the fruits of your labor with your neighbors.

name: Project Life is RPG
description: A brand new game where "life" will be key.

name: Mixmob: Racer 1
description:
Mixmob mashes music, fashion, art, and movies, into one game world on remix culture. level up from card strategy battle game to full MMO glory!

MixMob: Racer 1 is a racing card battle strategy game that remixes the fun and intense racing of Mario Kart with the card-based strategy and resource management of Clash Royale. Players will race experimental Alpha Bots along the Surface in an effort to become MixMob: Racer 1.

name: BlueSkies
description: BlueSkies is an RPG game made with RPG maker 2003 featuring an emotionally driven classical RPG atmosphere and an immersive world and plot that you can enjoy!! Follow the tale of Skye and his friends putting an end to a destructive force that threatens the world of "Vyen". As the battle between the humans and celestial beings are far from over.

name: Farewell Avalon
description:
Farewell Avalon is a top-down combat game with a unique twist to "death" and a deep storyline in a world unlike before.
Explore the ruins of Outpost 7 as you uncover the mysterious past of Archie and the Avalonian people. And alongside your journey, The Skribble will protect you through, no matter what.

name: Newcomer: A Language Learning RPG
description: Newcomer is a language learning videogame where you play and learn a second language through natural conversation.

name: Chasm Bound
description: Chasm Bound is a challenging 3D platformer where the player tries to escape from a deep pit in the ground.

name: Heavy Drinker
description: A Stream of Consciousness Retro Adventure for PlayDate

name: Hooligan Simulator: Survive in Urban Jungle
description: Hooligan Simulator is a first-person game where you establish yourself by painting graffiti all over the city. Be careful, though, because the police are hot on your trail. Explore the city, drawing graffiti, but stay one step ahead to avoid capture by the relentless police.

name: Lost Soul
description: “Lost Soul” is a multiplayer horror survival game for 1-4 players. Work together to rescue possessed souls, using your surroundings and strategy to fight and escape. Play cautiously to avoid detection while experiencing fear and excitement. Join with others, scream, and defeat the ominous threat.

name: Mutantity
description: Trapped, hungry, and lost, a father longs to reunite with his family. Surrounded by cave walls and a flashlight, he limps forward determined to find his escape. His only obstacle is the mysterious monster lurking in the shadows...

name: Esylium MMORPG
description: A new 2D MMORPG with trading, character customization, hundreds of items, and no pay-to-win! Level up quickly, trade anything, join friends for rewards, official Discord, daily backups, powerful server, PvP Arena, monster hunts, dungeons and more! Try it now!

name: The Soul Labyrinth
description: The Soul Labyrinth is a thrilling game where you must collect souls and escape a monster in an intricate, stylized maze. With each level, the monster's presence grows, creating a sense of dread.

name: Quadrium 2
description: Quadrium is back with a new and exciting mash-up of marble popper and match-3 challenge! Discover new bonuses and antibonuses and develop new strategies. Use mines to clear the field with explosive chain reactions and encounter fun boss battles that pit you against exciting challengers.

name: Meteor Down!
description: Meteor Down is set on a dystopian Earth ravaged by a trio of evil fantasy races. Start unlocking your inner tactical genius by diving into this narrative-driven rogue-lite deck builder.

name: POI: VR Dance
description: Experience the beauty of POI: VR Dance. Immerse yourself in a stunning virtual world and perfect your skills with intuitive controls. Whether you're a seasoned dancer or a beginner, POI: VR Dance is the perfect way to explore this beautiful art form from the comfort of your home.

name: Smart Fish
description: Smart Fish - A game with the solution of mathematical problems, they become more difficult depending on the level of passage, the further you swim, the more difficult the tasks, and the limited time will make you hurry up with the decision!

name: Trow's Space
description: Immerse yourself in a 2D pixel style game where you control a spaceship against enemy motherships. Your mission: destroy their towers with accurate shots. Face constant attacks and dodge asteroids, satellites and black holes. Beat levels to face more challenging enemies.

name: Something Wicked Lies Beneath
description: Explore the randomly segmented structures of your nightmares in this roguelike psychological horror game. Be strategic and efficient while completing randomized objectives with very limited oxygen, all while being hunted by whatever is down there with you. Many mysteries await your presence.

name: Dungeon Merchant
description: Buy and sell weapons, armour, potions and more to grow your humble shop. Hire adventurers and send them into the dungeon to collect loot for you. You've got a debt to pay to the king and in order to pay it, you're going to have to buy low, sell high and hope your hired heroes make it out alive.

name: Realms of Wilorth
description: Guide sacrificed warriors through elemental realms in 'Realms of Wilorth', a retro-styled action roguelike. Choose the Knight, Mage, or Rogue and defeat guardians to retrieve power seeds. Gain game-changing perks to level up in procedurally generated maps and become unstoppable!

name: Monsters' Gambits
description: Monsters’ Gambits: Card tactics game with infinite strategies on random chess fields. Fuse more than 300 monsters for powerful beasts. Summon, attack, trap, and unleash special abilities for the ultimate strategic experience.

name: Lost Station
description: You are a member of a special task force tasked with protecting the galaxy from a notorious pirate crew who have set their sights on capturing the most powerful source of energy in the universe: the spaceship's reactor. The consequences could be catastrophic.

name: The Dark Times of the Noble Family of Wildren
description: A narrative RPG set in a world where social inequality between estates has reached its peak. You are Allan Wildren, one of the scions of the noble House of Wildren, which is on the brink of collapse. Will you stay true to an unjust order, or... is it a better time for revolution? Dare to decide!

name: Midnight Pufferfish Show
description: Get ready for a heart-stopping adventure in the Midnight Pufferfish Show, the multiplayer game that brings the excitement of high-stakes! Outwit and outlast your opponents in a cutthroat contest where every step could be your last. Do you have what it takes to win the "Show"?

name: Convolution of Fear
description: Get ready for a challenging journey through a dark labyrinth filled with danger at every turn. Navigate treacherous paths and overcome the horrors lurking within to escape the endless terrors.

name: Total War: Pharaoh - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition for Total War: Pharaoh comes with the first future DLC release, and the Digital Soundtrack.

name: Burder
description: On Halloween night, explore your neighborhood and solve puzzles with weird mobile apps, as strange events start to occur.

name: In the footage
description: "In the footage" is a horror exploration game.[/h2]You awaken in an empty room with nothing to do but play a videotape lying on the floor and contemplate the meaning of the footage. That's all you can do at this point.

name: The Honeypot Murders
description: Arthur thinks he’s a smart guy. He isn’t. Help him solve puzzles, investigate the town, and uncover the mystery of his friends disappearance in this quirky adventure game inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Java Saga
description: Order up! Join Mornin’ Jo and D’Caff, the mischievous mixologist duo, on their daily grind as baristas in Suburb City! Keep a healthy work/fight balance as you serve customers and take down the dastardly cronies of T.E.A. Inc in Turn-Based combat in this zany Action RPG!

name: Void Funk
description: Void Funk is a narrative adventure game that puts you in the role of a cybersecurity analyst tasked with uncovering the true nature of artificial beings and saving humanity.

name: Jungle Gems VR
description: Jungle Gems VR: Dive into lush jungles, solve puzzles, and collect precious gems. Immerse yourself in a vibrant world, matching gems using intuitive controls. Uncover hidden chambers, navigate obstacles, and conquer increasingly complex challenges. A captivating adventure for VR enthusiasts.

name: Cloudburst
description: CLOUDBURST is the ultimate test of survival in a post-apocalyptic world. Survive the swarms and machines or battle it out battle-royale style. Scavenge, build, make friends, or kill them all. Don't get killed because there's no coming back. Will you be the last one standing on Problesk Island?

name: Unsheltered
description: Realistic survival simulation game, where players must endure and thrive while managing resources, crafting goods, and overcoming obstacles. The game features modern tools and equipment and the constant threat of nuclear war, adding urgency to the player's journey.

name: Slimes: Cannon Combat
description: Slimes Cannon Combat is a chaotic PvP arena game with 2-6 players. Challenge your friends in a top-down shooter where you try to blast them off the island using a variety of powerups that you combine for even more mayhem. Can you be the last slime standing as the island collapses around you?

name: Stalker Girl
description: In this game where we manage a student, we find ourselves in a dark classroom due to magic. Are you ready to go on this adventure where you will learn what is happening with our character in this mysterious environment?

name: The Battle for Vega
description: Inspired by the classic Space Invaders, The Battle for Vega takes the old-school gameplay you know and love and adds new features that make it a fresh and exciting experience.

name: RoboJesus
description: RoboJesus is an AI chatbot that simulates what it would be like to talk to Jesus Christ. What will you ask him?

name: Section Gamma
description: Section Gamma is a post-apocalyptic, turn-based strategy game for up to 4 players. Fight for dominance in the post-apocalyptic world of Section Gamma. Upgrade your troops, unlock new technologies, and use tactical cunning to defeat your enemies.

name: NightHover
description: The NightCity at night is a hoverbike racing arena. Have fun in 43 levels, gaining speed upgrades, shock powerups to slow other racers, repairing powerups and rockets to shoot kamikaze drones. Switch to the first person view for more immersive gameplay. Plays best with a controller!

name: MaryAnneEtte
description: A game about acting and performance, appease the audience and win the Master's approval. Smile Dear, everyone's watching you!

name: Dice World
description: Dice World is a turn-based roguelike game. Create your own party by combining skills with character. You need dice to use skills, but you also need strategic dice choices depending on the situation. Collect relics and enhance your skills to defeat your enemies!

name: Super Sean 008: Xelar's Revenge
description: I'm not bald!!! Wait what? The evil bald wizard Xelar has abducted Super Sean himself this time to take revenge for all the goody goody two shoes stuff he did in Super Sean 007. Fast paced 2D platform action!

name: Operator
description: In Operator, you will play as an elite "Tier 1" operator undergoing dangerous clandestine operations all over the globe. With a strategic, measured, and unforgiving style of gameplay. You are the tactical advantage, Good luck.

name: Arcane Survivors
description: Arcane Passage is a rogue light action game that takes you into dungeons to explore magic. Choose a class, combine spells and runes, and master the art of magic.

name: Liminal Space
description: Welcome to Liminal Space. We have been expecting you. Choose your map and try to escape. It's up to you if you want monsters chasing you or if you want a peaceful experience with no threats. With an unsettling soundtrack and fun graphic options, you'll have a good time for a cheap price.

name: Chicken Cluck Cluck!
description: In this humorously plotted point-and-click adventure game, fool around as a chicken by swallowing items and laying them back as eggs! Solve funny riddles, find ways to enter locked rooms, and talk to funny animals, enjoyable with an original hand-animated style!

name: Rebirth Evolution
description: 2D pixel style simulation business strategy game Build and operate your own survivor base, recruit and cultivate various professional combatants. Clear zombie strongholds, reduce regional infections, survive in the apocalypse, and establish your own power.

name: Schrott
description: SCHROTT - the roguelite driving game: Pull off insane stunts, collect valuable loot, and customize your absurd vehicle.

name: Garden of Pizzlerat
description: Welcome to [Game Title], a terrifying indie horror/Puzzle game that will have you on the edge of your seat! You play as [Protagonist], who finds themselves trapped in a [Location] filled with danger and terror. Use your [Gimmick mechanic] to find your way out!

name: Casting Whispers
description: Casting Whispers is a story-driven first-person horror mystery in the fictional New England industrial city of Corburgh. Investigate the run-down apartment building that your mentor seems to have vanished in, while an alien interdimensional being vies for your attention and, possibly, your life.

name: Palladium
description: A classical FPS based on movement filled with metroidvania elements and power ups to find by exploring the interconnected levels.

name: Astra Noctis
description: Astra Noctis is a Metroidvania more focused on combat than exploration. It contains some RPG touches, such as the inventory and equipment system. These systems encourage experimentation and the creation of different builds and playstyles.

name: Forum Mortuorum
description: Your gladiator school awaits you. You decide whom to hire, which matches to fight, and how to equip and train your gladiators. Set tactics for your gladiators, then throw them into the arena for fame and profit. Advance through the leagues, conquer great foes, and emblazon your name upon history.

name: Corpse Master
description: In Corpse Master, Raven must face endless hordes of demons and monsters to find and destroy the 3 fragments of the Corpse Master, with the help of special weapons, random and specific items and a lot of skill.

name: The Soul Box: Don Quixotes of Tomorrow
description: An (in)side story that sheds some light on El Capitan's past and the others' present.

name: Fishing Adventure: Finland Reserve
description: Embark on a new fishing adventure in "Fishing Adventure: Finland Reserve"! Explore a stunning Finnish lake, catch perch, zander, pike, salmon, and brown trout as you enjoy the crystal-clear waters and breathtaking scenery. Get ready for an unforgettable experience!

name: Store Story
description: One item shop and a huge debt to pay off. Manage your store and sell items to a diverse cast of customers. Befriend local adventurers, sell them gear, and send them on missions to bring back loot. React to the market's demands and set your own prices and in this UI driven fantasy shopkeeper game!

name: Sublime Element
description: Sublime Element is an open-ended puzzle game where you have to build and program mechanisms to mix elements and create new ones.

name: Plunder Masters
description: Build a skilled crew of thieves in Plunder Masters, a real-time tactics game. Master heists, steal from neighbors, banks, and criminals, and use the dynamic world to your advantage by hiding and creating distractions.

name: Red Entropy
description: 14000000000000000 years from now our sun is re-discovered by the last remains of humanity looking for any resources left in a dying universe.

name: Brainroll
description: Embark on a mind-bending adventure as Brainroll! Solve challenging puzzles in this sokoban-style game by moving brain blocks while sliding on ice. Relax in Brainroll's world, where clever thinking is the key to success. Get ready to roll your way to victory in this puzzle-packed sliding experience!

name: Corporate Fat Cat
description: Play the [fish] stock market as a cat trying to get out of the daily rat race.

name: Get Rich Slow
description: Welcome to Get Rich Slow, a life simulator with roguelite elements that lets you experience an entire life in a day. Make the choices that determine your character's fate and shape their story.

name: Bit Bike
description: Mostly black and white minimalist graphics. You are a self-controlled bicycle that needs to climb difficult obstacles using your skills. Find your way to freedom.

name: Crushing Depths
description: 'Crushing Depths' is a first-person horror game set deep down on the ocean floor, you will take control of an underwater drone tasked with locating points of interest using 3D spatial sound. But be on the careful lookout for anything that may lurk down there!

name: Deep Sea Rhapsody
description: This game is a game of musical rhythm, in which the player can pick up the drumsticks in the scene and beat the drums in the scene to relax rhythmically

name: Fist of the Stray Dog
description: Enter the ultimate virtual reality beat 'em up and test your martial arts skills in Fist of the Stray Dog. Experience the thrill of a dynamic combat system! Engage in intense battles against challenging opponents, using precise strikes and combos to defeat them.

name: Izio: The Pixel Kishi
description: This 2D pixel-art action game requires you to master the art of parrying to defeat your enemies.

name: Rise From the Ashes: A Fantasy World Simulator
description: A strategic city-building game set in a fantasy universe that allows you to create your own fantastical civilization. Define your architectural style using a building editor, customize your people, manage your city, and restore the past glory of your civilization!

name: Warnament
description: A turn-based grand strategy game, simple for newbies yet challenging for masters. As the leader of a nation, you will conquer territories and advance in military, technology, culture, or politics. Choose from historical scenarios or create your own with an editor.

name: Flick Shot Rogues
description: Flick Shot Rogues is a turn-based rogue-lite that turns movement into a skill shot! Aim and flick your hero to ricochet through levels, dodge enemy attacks, and smash your foes with crazy trick shots. Featuring near-endless replayability, fun upgrades, and a ton of mayhem.

name: They're Not Monsters
description: They're Not Monsters is a real-time Roguelike where you play as a mad scientist raising and controlling commandos of mutant rabbits. Activate chips in their brains, and go reconquer your kingdom... scientifically!

name: WaxHeart
description: An atmospheric horror 3D platformer about a wax boy with a lantern for a heart, journeying through a dark, ruined world.

name: Sommerland
description: Experience the lively Land of Honey and Wine, a relaxing game where you will build villages in vibrant, atmospheric landscapes. Complete quests, explore a collection of carefully crafted maps and unlock more than 30 unique buildings in this fresh take on the city-building genre.

name: Greymarsh Redux
description: Greymarsh Redux is an illustrated, text-based adventure game that prioritizes atmosphere, immersion, and dialog. Step into a gritty city-state plagued by crime, poverty, and an oppressive ruler. A simple but varied battle system encourages tactical decisions and efficient inventory management.

name: Natives
description: Natives is an open-world/sandbox game with survival elements that takes place pre-Christopher Columbus. The land is raw, nature is at its peak and the seasons are full of change.

name: Wake Up
description: This game is a 3D puzzles and first-person shooter elements. Explore an office space and try to understand whether you are in a dream or in reality. Be attentive and not miss any details, as time is running out. Remember: dying in a dream means waking up, while dying in reality means simply dying.

name: Chronos Affinity
description: "A Story-Driven Extraction Based Shooter"Chronos Affinity is an ultra-realistic first person shooter. Raid, fight, loot, and grow your inventory to better prepare yourself for survival. Join now and be apart of the interactive story!

name: Light of Coco
description: Play as Coco - a feline star creature. Use Coco's gentle meows to nurture the environment and ask your butterfly companions to assist you. Beware of the creatures lurking in the shadows.

name: Draikai
description: Help Bianca in Draikai, save her dragon. Face an evil scientist, discover secrets, defeat bosses, explore a pixel art world, and an amazing soundtrack. Overcome internal and external challenges in this unforgettable adventure.

name: Devil Apartment
description: Hello, Jake. Welcome to the game.

name: Realm Divided
description: Realm Divided is a turn-based strategy game that offers a quick and casual board game experience while providing deep and engaging tactics. Choose one of two factions as you build and fight to conquer the map to prove your skills as a superior commander.

name: Paradise Nowhere
description: Paradise Nowhere is a Backrooms game that blends abstract concepts with realistic graphics, evoking a feeling of liminality through empty spaces devoid of life. The game isn’t intended as a horror experience, your feelings towards liminal spaces might make it one. Or maybe, it's just the Paradise...

name: Ghoul Yeah Bunny
description: "Ghoul Yeah Bunny" As a treasure hunter stranded on Rabbit Island, solve puppet game puzzles and fight the terrifying Ghoul creature using your trusty lamp filled with rabbit lights. Find the island's 7 hidden treasures and escape to become rich in this suspenseful horror game.

name: CapybaRun
description: We're trying to find the items we need in a dark and scary maze and fighting against a giant creature that is chasing us!

name: MorDobble: Spot The Match
description: Playing MorDobble is easy. You'll be presented with a set of images. Your task is to find the matching pair before your opponent does. The gameplay relies on quick reflexes and keen observation skills, rather than on knowledge or strategy, which means that everyone has an equal chance of winning.

name: Dealership Simulator
description: Dealership Simulator is allows you to simulate a Vehicle Dealer´s Life in your Real Life while playing this game.

name: Fishbowl
description: Fishbowl is a slice of life, coming of age story told over a month. Video call loved ones, work from home, sort through puzzles to rediscover childhood memories, do care tasks and get to know yourself better, one day at a time.

name: SpaceWorm
description: SpaceWorm is a retro arcade game where you eat stars, planets and kill space-bugs.

name: Cosmic Persecution
description: Experience both being a one man army as well as running for your life in this intense action packed platformer. Maneuver between precarious environments and equip a cosmonaut of your choice with space-era weaponry to oppose overwhelming enemy forces.

name: Raven: The Goblin Hunter
description: It's time to descend into the underground tunnels and defeat the Goblin King who persecutes your People! Use your weapons, prepare your spells and destroy tens of thousands of Goblins! Raven is a TPS Isometric 3D Roguelike Shooting Game. Solve the Puzzles and Hunt the Goblins!

name: Eclipsium
description: Eclipsium is a trippy and surreal horror game that will take you on a journey through darkness and confusion. In this haunting and immersive experience, you'll need to traverse a dark and twisted world to reach a tower that's looming in the distance.

name: HXH
description: "HXH: Battle All One" is an action-packed fighting game. Players can choose from a variety of characters, each with their own unique fighting styles and special abilities. With fast-paced gameplay mechanics and the innovative "magic/kai" system, this game offers endless hours of entertainment.

name: Fortune Miles Away
description: Fortunes Miles Away is your ultimate cars racing competition blending unique missions, extensive choice of cars and actions-packed adventures. Wait no more, pick up your car, accept the first mission and off you go! Opportunities are everywhere and the more risky, the more rewarding they will be.

name: Totem Destroyer
description: Totem Destroyer - A game in the physical world where the player has to destroy wooden objects while keeping the totem above the fire, preventing it from approaching the flames.

name: Melvin finds home
description: Melvin the teddy is lost in the woods after camping. Help him find his way home!

name: Furia de Weichafes
description: Welcome to the Wallmapu Tournament: Fury of Weichafes, fight your way to be the tournament Winner

name: Avalanca
description: As you make your way down the mountain, you'll encounter a variety of challenges that will test your skill and reflexes. Jump over cliffs, weave through trees, and grind along rails as you try to stay one step ahead of the danger.

name: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of The Deep
description: Voxel Miner: Dwellers of the Deep, is a single player game where you mine resources to upgrade different skills, abilities, and fight the creatures you come across along the way! Strategize your upgrades, fight monsters, or just sit back and enjoy the satisfying mechanics. The choice is yours...

name: Mechanical Fury
description: Your arm has been replaced with a grappling hook, courtesy of the Machine Army. Return the favor with total annihilation. Grapple. Kick, and DESTROY everything that stands in your way!

name: Shambles
description: “The world you once knew is gone.”Leave your bunker and explore a world that’s gone through 500 years of change. Witness countless stories and intriguing events with your own two eyes. Will you bring peace to the world outside? Or march it towards its ruin? Everything is up to you.

name: Valden Saga
description: Valden Saga is a first-person action game in which you take on the role of a royal guard sent to unravel the cause of disasters in one of the kingdom's provinces.

name: Freelancer Simulator
description: You earn money by doing various kinds of work that you receive as a "Freelance" over the computer. With the money you earn, you can customize the house, improve yourself, have fun and more.

name: FallinBara
description: In this journey where we go deeper with our character dedicated to cutting enemies with the swords he holds in both hands, we not only cut the enemies we encounter, but also try to pass the obstacles we encounter with our agile movements.

name: Finesse
description: Jump your way to glory in this gravity-defying arcade platformer. Lasers attack the player from all sides, high and low, at merciless speeds. With well-timed moves, however, they zoom by without leaving a scratch. Survive to win fans, prizes, and more opportunities to dodge things.

name: Bite Size Terrors: Erobos Heaven
description: Unsettling & Disturbing Events Quickly Rise After Being Saved By God.

name: Black Finger Jet
description: "Black Finger JET" is a Run&Gun game. This is a completely new game from a team that has released many action shooting games.

name: Your Spaceport!
description: Manage your very own space station in this Tycoon game. Sell fuel and repairs to the visitors. Manufacture and research new ways to defend your business and make more money. Survive against all odds.

name: Zombie Runner
description: Zombie runner - 3D runner with a third-person view in which you have to control one of the undead. Run as far as possible while collecting as many brains as possible. Beat your own records on the way to perfection and prove to everyone that you are the most persistent zombie of all!

name: Volcano Planet
description: This game is a score attack type game where you rotate the volcano star with the [W][A][D] keys and destroy the meteorite with the lava part to earn a score.If a non-volcanic part of the star hits the meteorite, it will be a miss. Earn a score before you miss.

name: I Want to Be a Werewolf
description: "I Want to Be a Werewolf" is a text-based adventure where you can enjoy the detective elements of the Werewolf game and the stories of the characters.A strange room when you wake up. "werewolf game" that starts without knowing the purpose. Mystery & suspense that sees through deception.

name: Woodcutter
description: Woodcutter is a VR simulator that makes everyone feel like a real carpenter. The simulator reproduces the main stages of the production of window architraves: creating a workpiece blank, choosing the shape of the future architraves, sawing, milling, painting, etc.

name: Exerion II: Zorni
description: Cancelled NES port of Exerion II.

name: Pokengine
description:
A Pokémon MMO currently in open beta containing multiple fanmade regions and fakemon. In addition to the MMO, Pokéngine contains robust tools that allow you to design, build, and code your very own Region right inside your web browser using our custom language, JCoad.

The game currently contains multiple regions with their respective storylines like Rica, Borovia and Easter Island.

name: UnovaRPG
description: This MMORPG Pokemon online game is based on the Pokémon Indigo platform. Start capturing wild Pokemon on this MMORPG (X & Y and all generations available), set up your team with up to 6 of them and start battling online with more than +1,000,000 Pokemon Trainers from around the world! Meet new friends (and foes) and show that your team is the best on the battlefield!

name: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band
description: Led Zeppelin: Rock Band was a cancelled spin off for the Rock Band series based around the band Led Zeppelin. The game never got far in development before being cancelled.

name: Rock Band: Japan
description: Rock Band: Japan is a cancelled spinoff game in the Rock Band series. The game was intended to feature various songs from Japanese artists, alongside some Western songs. The game was cancelled due to licensing difficulties with Japanese songs and the cost of manufacturing the controllers for a Japanese audience.

name: Rock Band Sessions
description: Rock Band Sessions was a cancelled entry in the Rock Band series that was intended to be a sequel to Rock Band 3, however was scrapped during development. The game would've had a focus on the composition of music. Gameplay of the cancelled game was later shown off by IGN on May 12, 2015.

name: Compulsive
description: A palette of beautiful colors needs your help to get organized. This quick color matching puzzle game is easy to learn and difficult to put down. Ready to get Compulsive?

name: Basketball Arcade Stars
description:
How many baskets can you score in 40 seconds?
Basketball Arcade Stars is an addictive game designed for real basketball fans of all ages.

name: Juggle Struggle
description:
Juggle Struggle is a fast paced arcade jumper where you have to juggle the ball in the air under extreme conditions, as you try to avoid all incoming obstacles to become the Juggle Champion!
Compete against the world and your friends in 15 unique challenging stages.
The game features 36 different balls, ranging from basic sports balls (football, baseball, tennis ball, basketball etc), to more crazy balls like the sun, a disco ball, a slime ball, an atom or even a skull!
All balls have their own physic properties and you have to find the right ball, which fits your style of gameplay to beat the stages.
So, what are you waiting for? Enter the arena and become the juggle champion!

name: Deep Golf
description:
Golf down through the Earth. Billions of procedurally generated holes, every game and device is different. Play to the center of the Earth and see what you find along the way. Replay with all new holes.
How deep can you go?
Touch and drag to shoot. Tilt to add some spin. Put the ball in the hole.
Play anywhere on your Apple Watch.
Instantly try or share Deep Golf with its AppClip. Even save the AppClip onto an NFC Tag.
I hate ads too. So there aren't any. You can upgrade to play with much longer courses, and use any ball before unlocking it with holes-in-one.
