Upgrade to also play with some fun Physics. Bouncier? Stickier? Mixed with a Square golf ball? Upgrade to mix and match.

name: Speed Bike Racing
description: You are a speed bike racer, and the legendary MotoX motorcycle race is closely approaching. You have decided to test your skills before the big event. The goal is to ride as far as you can in total meters, before you crash your bike. The further you go, the more prestige and famous you become.

name: Alchemy Dungeon
description:
Alchemy Dungeon is a mix of puzzle and roguelike. Your goal is to merge items, discover new recipes, explore endless dungeons, slay monsters and find treasures. Your best scores are used to unlock unique characters, powers, and levels, and the loot you find is used for upgrades.
The game is simple to learn but hard to master. It is offline and is designed for one-hand operation.

name: Everdream Valley: GOG Exclusive DLC
description: Sin descripción

name: City Slickers
description: Welcome to City Slickers, the ultimate co-op sandbox game for you and up to 4 friends! Immerse yourself in a bustling city filled with cars, planes, boats, and NPCs, and let your imagination run wild with a cute physics-based active-ragdoll character!

name: Back Rooms: Ground Zero
description:
A Backrooms fangame.

Traverse the backrooms like it's 1986, in my game inspired by Famicom visual novels and adventure games.
Move room to room, in hopes of finding anything. And discover if there was ever a way out to begin with.

name: Total Upheaval
description:
Every decade, a list of the 100 Most Influential People is drafted up, with a heavy emphasis placed on those in the top 25. Dubbed MIRS (Most Influential 25) by the general populace, these selected few are invited to a conference by NEXT, the world's leading megacorporation. While the public eye becomes fixated on the NEXT World Conference, no one except the attendees will ever learn what happened behind these closed doors.

This leads to the conference becoming hijacked by an unknown party. Kidnapped, the attendees are whisked away to an abandoned university. Everyone wakes up discombobulated. Once bearings are found and introductions are made, the school's unusual principal finally reveals himself: Kingpen, the Crowned Al-Capone Penguin. Despite his cuddly looks, he thrusts the entire group into a no holds barred killing game.

Who will die? Who will survive? Who is pulling the strings? Why a penguin!?

name: Pokémon Edición Reloaded
description: A Pokémon fangame for windows that features real time battles. It is currently in development but has released multiple betas.

name: Revenant Hill
description: It’s 1919 and Twigs the cat has a dream. Find a safe place to sleep. Put down roots. Grow some radishes, get a job, eat mice, do dangerous things with new friends, and build something together in a world falling apart.

name: Phantom Blade 0
description:
Phantom Blade Zero is a an action RPG featuring deep and dark art style, fast paced combat, and a fictitious world blending Chinese martial arts and steampunk!
Be the Dark Raider exiled by "The Order", embark on the path of vengeance, and uncover the darkest secrets of Wulin!

name: Fairgames
description: Welcome to Fairgames - your chance to rob the rich and rebalance the scales. Fairgame$ is a competitive modern heist game where you team up to break into exotic locations and steal the cargo. The twist? You not only need to outsmart guards and security systems - you also compete against other teams. Crews that extract with the most loot and flair might just rise to the top of Fairgames. Take it 'til you make it - who will you recruit first for your crew?

name: The Dusk Alliance
description: The Dusk Alliance is a 1-4-player coop Action/Investigation horror game.

name: Moon Observatory Melanie
description:
Moon Observatory is a fantasy otome game series created by Batensan.
In the universe of MO, there are thirteen worlds named after months, with one final nameless world. Each world has a Magician, a half-immortal being who watches over their world's residents.

name: Supraworld
description: Supraworld is a first-person puzzle metroidvania. Be tiny in a handcrafted toy world. Explore, solve puzzles, ignore the main quest, get out of bounds, find secret areas, convict murderers. Hunt for powerful new abilities to unravel this vast, interconnected world… And don't forget to save the princess.

name: Escape from Puppy Death Factory
description: Escape From Puppy Death Factory is an action-puzzle platformer released by Adult Swim Arcade.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Revolutionary Armaments Pack
description: Arm yourself for the revolution!

name: Blind Bullet
description: Shoot towards darkness.Blind Bullet is a top-down 2D shooting game.You're blind in this game.You can see around by echolocation with your footstep sound.This game is under development.You can play by the end of Chapter 1 with demo version.Full version will also be available for free.

name: Minion Shooter
description: Protect the last coffee plant in the world from alien monsters with your custom fruit gun as the hero of Smash Anarchy! Collect coins & power ups while battling a plethora of creatures in an expansive new world with vibrant colors & engaging content! Strap in for compelling FPS gameplay that will keep you on the edge of your sofa, seat or wherever you choose to play!

name: Dont Touch Your Face
description:
Did you ever notice how many times do you touch your face in a day? Not even that long, in one minute. More important than that, how long can you go without doing it?
Don't Touch Your Face is a game about this simple, yet seemingly unachievable goal. It's simple and fast, you'll need concentration and discipline, as well as nimble fingers.

name: EvoPet
description:
EvoPet is a spiritual successor to the original VPet (virtual Pet) devices from the 90’s.
Hatch and collect multiple pet monster’s to raise, train and achieve a Mega evolution. Discover the various deck combinations and, through employing card strategy, be the ultimate champion.

name: Ghost Blast
description:
A beautiful match 3 puzzle game starring ghosts!
Leave the dusty halls of an abandoned clock tower to haunt your way through a town in the dead of night! Will you be able to enjoy the ghost and reclaim what has been lost, before the night is over?
Make the most scary combinations and get through challenging levels full of fun! Smash ghost together and match the rarest treats to feed your spiders.

name: Kawaii Mansion: Home Makeover
description: Loving cute game art and enjoy the pleasure of finding hidden objects in pretty scenes? Kawaii Mansion is the perfect fit for you! Tag along with Noah - a charming landlord who will guide you through the best home design experience as you discover the guests' stories through your distinctive mansion design. Let's get creative, shall we?

name: Narcos: Idle Cartel
description:
When you find yourself partnered with El Patrón, the legendary smuggler, you’ll discover just how dangerous and seductive his world can be. Will you keep your hands clean or will you do whatever is needed to survive and thrive?
In this idle clicker game, you decide who becomes the ultimate business tycoon. Form alliances and rake in the idle money. You’re the jefe in this idle game and it’s your job to manage the production, distribution, and profit of the business. Become a billionaire by expanding your cartel business, tapping to build the best product. Experience the thrilling cartel life in Narcos: Idle Cartel!

name: Pinball vs. Solitaire
description:
Welcome to Pinball Vs Solitaire!
A unique arcade card-game.
Use pinballs to collect cards and complete a solitaire deck.
Merges a classic card-game with iconic pinball mechanics.

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
description: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Meteorite Miner
description: Meteorite MinerIn this thrilling 2D space mining game, you'll take on the role of a daring asteroid miner. Armed with your trusty mining laser, you'll blast through space rocks to extract valuable minerals and resources.

name: True Maze Defiance
description: "True Maze Defiance" is a thrilling game where you navigate a ball through a challenging maze, collecting diamonds and avoiding obstacles. Its unique control system, which uses mouse tilting, adds to the excitement and immersion. With engaging gameplay and increasing difficulty.

name: The Diner
description: This project started as a small prototype, for testing Godot 4's new graphics capabilities, but as time went on, it slowly became a full-on, short, interactive horror experience.

name: War Legends
description: War Legends is a classic real-time strategy. There are no auto battles or asynchronous multiplayer. The game happens in real time and you control every single unit on the battlefield. You have to mine resources, build structures, and hire an army, just as it used to be in the old school RTS on PC.

name: Akasha
description: Akasha is a 2nd person fighting game and shooter hybrid with a PvPvE extraction game mode. It blends the two genres by allowing the player to control 2 characters in real time.

name: Patchouli: A Little War in Bland-Old Library
description: Patchouli is a Touhou fangame based on the gameplay of the Suguri series, featuring horizontal scrolling shooting gameplay.

name: SMW
description: An open-source reimplementation of Super Mario World. It requires the original game to extract its assets.

name: Jacob Jazz's The Bus
description: A short horror story epilogue of Tamarindo's Freaking Dinner, the upcoming sequel to Baobabs Mausoleum.

name: Immersive Jurassic World Roller Coaster VR
description: This is a unique 3D casual game. Bringing players into the original lush forest and exotic planet through immersive VR technology, and experience the world of dinosaurs.

name: Lord of Terror
description: In a galaxy far away a world is facing doomsday. As nations rise against each other the world is plunged into chaos. Many illegal groups such as gangs and independent militias and demonic cults take the advantage of the situation to expand. Your task is to assassinate a demon dubbed Lord of Terror.

name: Liberation
description: Liberation is a strategy survival horror game. You have to go to the Deathworld and collect crosses to liberate ghosts. Survive from the attacks of various ghosts!

name: Paranormal Pop
description:
Pop, Blast and Banish Ghosts!
The intrepid ghost hunter McGrimsby needs your help! A sinister entity has come to haunt the shady town of Spookshire! Pop your way to the heart of the matter and figure out who’s unleashed all of these ghosts!
Paranormal Pop is a Match-3 ghost busting game with more than one twist, including unique gameplay, missions and special hidden bonus levels! Meet wicked companions, and deliciously evil bosses in this first chapter in the Spooktacular world or Paranormal Pop!

name: Treasure Tombs: Ra Deal
description: Tip-toe your way through cursed Egyptian tombs, picking up priceless loot and ancient artifacts, and meet some very interesting characters along the way in Dark Tonic is puzzle-strategy “rogue-lite” adventure.

name: Nano Force
description:
Get ready for some paint-splattering, adrenaline-pumping action in this color-filled multiplayer first-person shooter!

Blast goo and cover the playing field in your team's color before time runs out, all without getting soaked by enemy fire. Whether you're a casual or competitive player, come join the messy, colorful fun and shoot your way to victory.

name: Synth Beasts
description: Capture and harness powerful beasts to do combat and traverse the world in this monster taming action-adventure. Unravel the mystery of your existence by exploring a sinister island laboratory and putting an end to the creation of the Synth Beasts.

name: MicroMachines
description: Game Boy Advance port of the remake of Micro Machines.

name: Puffer Pop
description: Puffer Pop is a short puzzle game about saving a pufferfish from the sharks that chase her. Eat bubbles, inflate, and turn the tides on those that would eat you, all while relaxing to calming sound of ocean waves.

name: AlterSpace
description:
A space exploration game.

Explore the huge universe while you also try to find out why all humans got extinct, and by what.

name: Rube Goldberg Workshop
description: In Rube Goldberg Workshop, you can make tons of different machines from over 80 components. Go from virtual reality to mixed reality and use objects and surfaces in the real world as part of your creations. Bounce basketballs off your ceiling and into a set of drums! Use your kitchen table to set up an epic car stunt jump, equipped with fireworks and all! If you can imagine it, you can build it. Push the boundaries of your imagination in a game made for mixed reality.

name: Unreal World
description: A hanging up game for material collection and value enhancement

name: Dreams of Valhalla
description: Dreams of Valhalla is an action rogue where you battle through the 9 realms in order to obtain eternally glory in Valhalla.

name: Chenmo de Xishuai
description: Chenmo de Xishuai is a cricket fighting game.

name: Swap: Mobile Edition
description: A simple yet brutally difficult game that will undoubtedly frustrate and personally insult you. Uncover a story full of psychological manipulation and emotional warfare while banging your head against unfairly designed levels. Sound like fun? Great! Let's see how that optimism is doing for you in a few hours.

name: Wildlife Hunter: Survival
description:
Embark on an epic journey through diverse landscapes as you face the challenge of two exciting game modes: Level Mode and Survival Mode. In Level Mode, sharpen your hunting instincts and complete various tasks by taking down specific animal targets. Show off your marksmanship and strategic thinking as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

If you're up for the ultimate test of survival, then Survival Mode is for you. Brace yourself as waves of wild animals approach, each more aggressive than the last. Your goal is to withstand the onslaught and survive against all odds. Can you keep your cool and outsmart these cunning creatures?

name: The Centennial Case
description:
The Centennial Case: A Shijima Story is a new unique mystery-adventure game.
Directed by Koichiro Ito (Metal Gear Solid V), and with Yasuhito Tachibana, producer of Netflix's 'The Naked Director' serving as the Cinematographer and Scenario Director, beautiful yet thrilling live-action footage intertwines with mysteries to solve, creating highly immersive gameplay.
The player follows a chain of murders which take place over the span of a century. Four murders have been committed in three different time periods - 1922, 1972, and 2022.
Each episode is comprised of three parts, the Incident phase, the Reasoning phase, and the Solution phase, inviting the player to seamlessly enter into this world of mystery.
Explore these time periods, collect multiple clues, and solve a 100-year mystery.

name: Omega 13
description: You play as a mech pilot who survived the war. In order to find someone, you join the arena and fight to the championship. You will also meet a mysterious woman and uncover the truth about the eternal night of the planet.

name: Zewels
description:
Zewels is an addictive puzzle game experience that breaks the mold of classic puzzle games.
In Zewels Puzzle RPG, you'll need to use all your skill and intelligence to beat progressively tougher levels.
Combine gems to win magical power-ups and blast your way to victory.
Starting at level 0, there are a total of 20 levels, and 4 modes: three single player and one multiplayer.
As you gain more experience, you'll have an ever-greater advantage over your opponents.
To reach level 20, you'll need to pass a series of challenging tests in all four modes.
You can also enhance your abilities with Super Powers and Super Combos that will help you achieve maximum control of your mental powers.

name: Double View
description: Can you handle this mind-blowing experience? Control two squares across screens with different layouts and try to reach the finish line without hitting any walls or obstacles. Double View is a unique game that will push your concentration and motor skills to a whole new level. Test yourself!

name: Search
description: Embarking on an epic journey of discovery through a huge but lifeless mechanical planet belonging to the old man. Explore dark underground complexes, fight hostile machines and silicon-based life, meet different humans, life, machines!

name: Target
description: Target is an action-packed, multiplayer game where players take control of miniature toy tanks and engage in intense battles with each other. The game is set in a variety of environments, from living rooms to backyards, or as far as what your mind can produce.

name: Hotel Renovator: Futuristic Furniture Set
description: Welcome to the future of hotel interior design! Get the Futuristic Furniture Set that brings cutting-edge furnishings to your renovation toolkit. Step into the next century with sleek and stylish furniture that will transform your hotel into a high-tech heaven

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - VDL Bus Pack
description:
Get ready to enjoy the latest Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop expansion pack and expand your bus fleet with three new fancy buses!
This Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop - Bus Pack includes three new buses licensed from renowned manufacturer VDL Bus & Coach!

name: Charon's Staircase: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: In this first-person horror mystery game, you set out to bury the horrible past of a tyrannical government. Retrieve and destroy the documents that unravel the secrets that lie beneath Oack Grove. This Digital Deluxe Edition includes a Digital Artbook and the OST.

name: Bus Simulator 21: Next Stop - MAN Bus Pack
description:
Attention all Angel Shores and Seaside Valley bus drivers!
You want to upgrade your fleet with the content of the "Bus Simulator 21 Next Stop Extended Edition", including the fresh design of the new MAN Lion's City 12 city bus with three fancy interior sets? Then this is the perfect expansion pack for you!

name: Block Breakerz
description:
Block Breakerz is a fast paced, 4 player, arcade game that blends Breakout and Hungry Hungry Hippos into a party game you just can't stop playing.
Compete solo or against up to three of your friends in 4 different game modes that will have you playing ‘just one more round’ for hours on end.
Block Breakerz is a frantic and fun game for the whole family that you can play anytime and anywhere on your iPad!.

name: Escape Blythe Castle
description:
Escape Blythe Castle is a level based, adventure & puzzle escape game. Each room has a story to tell, and there are many tricky puzzles to solve.
The story begins in modern day Europe on Castle grounds. The Princess gets wind of distressing news regarding the King's sudden disappearance. The Kingdom has suddenly fallen under attack!

Without haste, you are instructed by Queen Beatrice to flee to the Castle's long kept secret rooms & embark on a dangerous quest to solve the puzzles within, and escape each room ... No one has ever set foot in this part of the Castle... you are the brave & privileged first visitor.

The only way you can save the Kingdom is to gain access to a priceless family heirloom, buried deep within the Castle.

name: Dungeon Burglars
description: Dungeon Burglars is a 'manual' tower defence game with a minimalist pixel art graphical style. Gameplay involves buying and placing traps and then tapping to activate them. The normal mode is quite short, so it's perfect for killing time on your commute.

name: Against War: Medieval
description:
Take the enemy tower down and defeat their commander!
You can use siege hammers, trebuchets, siege towers, and other siege weapons that suits your strategy to destroy the enemy's castles.
You can also send soldiers to climb up the walls and take out the enemy commander.
Try out various strategies!

name: Spaceship Running Dudu
description: _ This game get idea from endless running game.

name: Ridiculous Triathlon
description:
Run, swim and drive in ridiculous ways in this is amazing runner!
Ridiculous Triathlon is the story of 3 characters that put their forces together to be able to compete in a triathlon!
They form a perfect trio but on their own they would not have any chance to win the competition!
They need you to help them dodge all the obstacles and pass the different stages of the game!
In this original, innovative and ridiculous endless runner game visit different cities of the world such as Barcelona, London & Tokyo!
Travel these emblematic cities in the three triathlon stages that include running, cycling and swimming!
Each of the different triathlon stages have their own funny and simple dynamics and controls!

name: Real Riders
description:
The classic is back, stronger than ever! Enjoy the best physics simulation over two wheels and the best graphics.
Real Riders. Completely free without in-app purchases. Beat your friends on the scoreboards.
An indie game that will make you dream with impossible speeds.

name: Project Hypnagogia
description: An experiment set up by a mad scientist called "Hypnagogia" to reveal absolute fear by revealing the subject's most terrifying images into reality. The line between dream and reality is blurred. It's not easy to find a way out when there's only one scary dream going on around you.

name: Presences: Dark Awakening
description: Explore a dark reality, discover a forgotten ritual, interact with the world around you, solve ancient puzzles, platform treacherous underground chambers, and feel the terror. Survive the night in this interactive haunted house narrative adventure from a first-person perspective.

name: Tracks of Triumph
description: Dive into this shell-shocked, fast-paced, top-down adventure and help Shiny the Tank clear out his battlegrounds and get rid of all enemy contraptions!

name: Fantasy World TD
description: Defend and defeat enemies by defending worlds

name: Mobilization
description: First person shooter. Light humor, dynamics and action will allow you to return to the atmosphere of first-person shooters of the 90s.

name: Mush Rush: Stock Market Tycoon
description:
Welcome to Shroom Land!
A stock market paradise waiting to be discovered! Play as Shroomy, a young mushroom who hopes to achieve financial freedom by investing in the psychedelic stock market. Equipped with several tools to make sound investment decisions, Shroomy ventures into the vast world of stock trading. With the loving support of his family and neighbours, Shroomy is destined for success in the market!

name: Binary Rush
description:
Binary Rush is a simple but challenging game that will mess with your head and test your reflexes!
Tap left and right to control both dots in their endlessly scrolling virtual world while avoiding obstacles.

name: Think Shift
description: If you like solving Rubix cube, jigsaw puzzles or sliding puzzles, then Think Shift is for you. Base on the simple mechanic of sliding puzzle, Think Shift will provide endless hours of puzzle solving.

name: Fish Party Online
description: Fish Party Online is an exciting and enjoyable Online Party game. Perfect for the casual gamer! Play single player mode to master your skills or play online against other players. A great entertaining game for friends and family!

name: Foodie Avenue
description: Build a town filled with restaurants from all over the world in Foodie Avenue. You’ll cook food from all cultures using ingredients produced by your own town. Create a world famous food destination and earn money by completing food orders from visiting foodies.

name: Delven
description: Explore the subterranean depths of an infinite 2D world and discover unique biomes, monsters, artifacts and more. Build your base to gather and manage resources. Fight bosses in tactical, turn-based battles and unlock dazzling and powerful loot!

name: The Diary
description: Several diaries gradually reveal the thrilling story of a missing case; after multiple deductions, are the answers in the past or present? With frequent plot twists, you never know which is the truth and which is the unexpected; in a dense fog, time buries the past, but the marks remain.

name: Traffic Racer Highway Online
description: Multiplayer highway car racing, with amazing missions, daily event , and Friends Challenge

name: Survivors Will
description: This is a casual Roguelike game that allows characters to become stronger and stronger through repeated choices, breaking free from the heavy siege of monsters!

name: You'll Stay Here Forever
description: Proxima Centauri b was discovered on August 24, 2016. The rovers sent to the planet are not responding. It turned out that the planet's atmosphere does not allow radio signals to pass through. You have been sent to the planet's surface to find them.

name: Just Dance 2023 Edition
description: A cancelled Google Stadia port of Just Dance 2023 Edition was announced at the game's initial reveal during an Ubisoft Forward, however due to the fail of the Google Stadia the game would never come out after the announcement of the discontinuation of the console coming 2 months before the games release.

name: The Legend of Zelda: Relics of the Past
description: A mod for The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild which changes the game to be more challenging by enhancing the map and enemy locations, being akin to an unofficial expansion for the game.

name: Mumu's Soup Adventure
description:
Jill the candy making witch summoned a cute little ghost cat named Mumu to help her with her candy making duties.

One day, Jill decided to make soup and Mumu agreed to help. All was going well until Jill decided Mumu's heart would be a part of the recipe! Scared for his life, Mumu barges out of the house and escapes, but Jill does not intend on letting him go that easily...

During his escape, he encounters various characters and slowly uncovers the truth that ties everyone together.

name: Retrowave Illusions: Aesthetics Edition
description: Retrowave illusions offers above all a visual and sound experience that will delight fans of the genre and will surely make those who don't know it yet discover this wonderful universe. Retrowave Illusions is unique experience of being immersed in wonderful world for at least a few moments.

name: Rap Simulator
description: Rap Simulator is in basically a production with a great deal of humour. The action starts in the 80s of the last century. The player takes on the role of a rapper who sets up his first music studio in a rented apartment. Our task is to break out of the underground and become a part of the mainstream for good, opening our own label or creating the best clothing brand. Beefs, chases, money, green leaves, shootings, gang wars or maybe a softer way to success? The way the player chooses to reach the top will depend only on him/her. At the beginning of the game, the player's budget is limited, so you have to decide which aspect of the production you want to devote more attention to at the cost of the other elements.

name: Broken Colors
description:
Eventually, we're all just gonna break.

You are a cashier at a convenience store, depressed and lonely with your mundane life, hoping for a bit of excitement. One day you meet a peculiar stranger who's sweet and shy at first, but one kind gesture is all it takes to make him stalk admire you a bit too much and be a danger to everyone else around you. Be careful how you treat him and others, for pain and death will follow you like a shadow. But perhaps fate has other plans for you...

name: An Elaborate History of Chess
description: An Elaborate History of Chess is a crafting strategy game touring the history of Chess. In true Chess tradition build castles, explore dungeons, farm turnips and get checkmated by a tree. Find answers to Chess's darkest questions, like why the horse piece moves in an L-shape.

name: Never Grave: The Witch and the Curse
description: A Metroidvania x Roguelite, where you advance using a cursed hat. Use a variety of magic or possess your enemies to reach the lowest levels! Bring back loot, build new facilities in your village, make a living and strengthen yourself for the next battle! Supports up to 4-player multiplayer.

name: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist - Special Edition
description: Passpartout 2: The Lost Artist has you back in the painting smock of your favorite green painter as you try to make a name for yourself in the art community by selling out your personal works for art that you create using an MS paint style interface.

name: Soukaishin
description:
Is running away the only thing you can do? A horror ADV game in which you are helplessly tossed about by the malice that relentlessly looms over you.

When you wake up, you find yourself in an abandoned hospital. You can't even remember why you're here. Can you solve the mysteries of the hospital and escape alive while avoiding the looming dangers?

name: Anomalous City
description: Anomalous City is an adventure game inspired by SCP and Cthulhu mythology.

name: Toyforming
description: In Toyforming, your drawings will come to three-dimensional life with the power of artificial intelligence (AI) and will inhabit a planet all of your own making. Your 3D artwork will have a mind of its own and interact with its surroundings. Turn on AR Mode to merge reality with your toyformed reality!

name: Photon: Planet Regenerator
description:
Connect the falling meteorites and blow them up,
Defense + neglect training game.

name: With Mountain Smiling
description: The Antarctic expedition in this game is still about extreme cold and darkness, but there is a guarantee of safe return, the danger is not so much constant as it is ever-present, and the new arrivals were not men.

name: MazyMazes
description: A story about a party of adventurers who seek an amethyst which a god of the earth is sealed in.

name: Rainbow Witch
description: In this game you can not attack. You will have to send back the bullets that are coming your way!

name: RabbitConquest
description: In this game rabbits rule civilization.

name: Deep Sea Sweep
description: A cute 2d platformer where you clean the ocean floor of filthy treasure chests.

name: Fish or Chicken
description: In this game you need to utilize your time carefully if you wanna reach the highest area!

name: Anti-World Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Zakuro
description: A heartfelt but bloody tale about monsters known as the angels, appears in the cold ruins of Shinjuku.

name: Out of the World
description: "In this world, "only what you see" is true." This game is a 2.5D platformer puzzle action game in which objects seen by the character materialize and disappear from existence when the character meditates.

name: Heart of Sengoku
description: Develop the warring countries of Japan, collect tea utensils, warlords, and cultural figures, steal the country, and take over the country. Easy, original historical collection game.

name: Densha-zukuri no Popo
description: This is a story about creating trains.

name: Winds of Destiny
description: Few manage to be masters of their destiny. Many give in to duty, others try to rebel and fail in the attempt. What will be your case? Dare, find out. You could say you were leading a normal life, but you always felt different from the rest. You returned from Canada to your hometown after Mom passed away. But everything changed radically the day you met Ceina, (ex) Queen of Heaven. What does your help ask to stop his sister, his counterpart, Satanichia. To do this, you must train and strengthen your powers in a very unique and erotic way. While you continue working in an exclusive Women's Academy, and caring for the little family you still have. Will you be able to fulfill your destiny? From protecting the people you care about? Which path will you choose?

name: Pokémon Sage
description:
Pokémon Sage is an upcoming role-playing video game and Pokémon fangame developed by members of the 4chan board /vp/.

It takes place in a fictional region called Urobos. Urobos is loosely based on Central and South America, with many Pokémon, though not all, being related to the real-life region.

name: Pokemon Flux
description: Altera is a wild and diverse region that overflows with abundance as well as danger. It is also the only place in the Pokémon world that emanates large amounts of Flux energy, a potent resource that has many uses. The value and power of this resource led to rapid economic growth of the region. However, shortly after humans began tapping into Flux energy for power, reports started to emerge about vicious, powered-up Pokémon appearing: the Alter Pokémon.

name: Project Proxima
description: Explore a star system while surviving the harsh conditions of space and whatever lurks in the darkness.

name: Slam Jump
description:
In late 2017, Jagger, a wealthy Russian Media Mogul, introduced the Slam Jump Tournament to the entire world. Warriors from all around the world applied to participate, but only the BEST qualified.
Slam Jump is a two button arcade fighting game drilled to very basic combat actions: Jumping and Kicking. No more having the screen filled with many buttons for different actions. Jumping and Kicking is all that matters and it gives rise to very intense strategic fights.

name: Slappy Paddles
description:
Test your reflexes in this single player reimaging of the classic arcade tennis game.
Battle your way through 5 different levels, each offering a unique style and set of obstacles to overcome.
Between bouncing off pinball paddles, doging 8-bit style space ships, or navigating the paths of a mini-golf course, you won't be able to let your guard down for a second.

name: Kase & Thyme: The Manor Rouge
description: Survival Horror text adventure with multiple paths and outcomes! Uncover the bloody, spooky ongoings at The Manor Rouge, with fiery detectives, Kase & Thyme. Find the missing child, Lancel, before it’s too late. Darkly comedic, inspired by classic B-Horror films.

name: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy
description: Tap, Click ‘n Destroy is free space mining simulator with core game mechanic of incremental clicker games with small additions of arcade elements. Tap to destroy asteroids, planets and even stars in your endless adventure across the universe. Earn money with your mining skills, improve your spaceship with various modifications and build your private space station with various modules.

name: Football Boss: Be The Manager
description:
Build and run your own football empire!
Have you always wanted to run your own football club and lead it to huge success?
In Football Boss, your dream can come true! It’s your team, your staff, your own football empire.
Create a football club from scratch and lead it to new heights…
Start as a small non-league team, take it sky high through 10 divisions to conquer the top.

name: SuperPower: World at War
description:
Real-time Online War Simulation Game - Super Power!
Become the President. Rule the country and conquer the world!
You can enjoy 1:1 battles. Conquer the world with allied forces to root out organized crime groups. We invite you to a new world of real-time strategy game.

name: Helicopter Rescue Team Game
description:
Be a rescuer in this new and amazing helicopter game!
Use your flying skills to find missing people, put out fires and save citizens in distress.
Patrol 12 different scenarios with their own, unique characteristics.

name: LetterStealth
description: Go on a stealthy mission disguising yourself as a letter.

name: Baseball Superstars 2023
description:
The fun never stops in Baseball Superstars 2023!
This time, we've got three friends from Com2uS's Minigame Party join Baseball Superstars as trainers!
Meet these adorable trainers who know how to hit massive home runs and throw incredible pitches!

name: Lost Skies
description: Lost Skies is a cooperative survival adventure for 1–6 players set amongst the clouds, in a vast sky of floating islands. Find and craft ancient technology, build your own skyship, brave ferocious storms, and battle giant threats that await beyond the horizon.

name: Argus
description: This caped superhero game is a very rare unreleased prototype. The game was originally called 'Protector' (the official test name was 'VideoMan'). Tom wanted Gottlieb to get the Superman license but they didn't. 'VideoMan' was too close to 'SuperMan' so they went with 'Protector', but the name was also changed at one point to 'Guardian', and then 'Argus' (designers' joke name became 'ProVidGuardArgus').

name: Talking Cat Emma Ballerina
description:
My virtual pet Emma the cat has reached a new stage in her life: ballet dance school for talking pets. This talking kitty cat will show off her new ballerina dance skills in Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game. Teach my talking cat Emma virtual pet bring style and grace into the world of talking pets. Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina is a talking cat app that enriches all those dance games and ballerina games out there.

Can you multitask and make your talking cat ballerina glow from head to toe by making sure she is well fed, examined and rested? Emma the Ballerina, my talking cat, needs you every step of the way, so download Talking Cat Emma - My Ballerina virtual pet game and help your talking cat pave the way to success! Virtual cat talking games will from now on take your breath away while my talking cat Emma parades her dance steps and ballet moves in her prima ballerina costume.

name: Arcade Classics
description:
This prototype was never released (6 units are known to exist). If this game had been released on schedule it would have commemorated Atari's 20th anniversary. It has 2 games on offer, "Super Centipede" and "Missile Command II". They are both re-makes of the original classics but with enhanced graphics and sound.

After selecting "more new stuff" in the operator's mode; two kinds of spaceships will appear in the "Missile Command II" game. The "Mothership" that appears after a few levels is exactly the same as (except less detailed than) "Birdsnest", which is a spaceship on page 21 of the 1978 book "Spacecraft 2000 to 2100AD".

The spaceships in the "Invasion Wave" are probably ripped from another book in the series.

name: Jumpy
description: A 2D platformer jump-rope simulator. The game comes with accolades that you get when you reach a certain number of jumps that tell you how many times you've reached that milestone.

name: Bishook.
description: Bishook is a unique strategy board game that blends Chess and an in-a-row game for twice the fun.

name: Ludo's Quest
description:
Ludo's Quest is a side-scrolling platformer inspired from Super Mario Bros and Ghosts 'n Goblins. Fun for the young and old. Complete all 16 levels.
Want more levels? Become a game designer and craft your own with the built-in level editor. You can even publish your levels on the web to share with friends and family. Play levels others have crafted.

name: Beyond U
description: Sin descripción

name: Where's the Floor?
description: Roll around to uncover the floor and find the finish. Collect gems to style your ball, upgrade to expert controls, unlock camera zoom, and get crazy glow floors!

name: Sequentia
description: The goal is simple : Just find the best path between the start & end points that allows you to collect the required items on your way & avoid hitting the obstacles or collecting non-required items.

name: All Star Quarterback 22
description: ﻿Call the shots and make every big choice in the game. Lead your team to glory in the ultimate football simulation!

name: Lost In Space: Dimensions
description:
Explore space and all his dimensions with Lost in Space!
Pilot your spaceship in deep space and avoid planets, asteroids and black holes by collecting power ups and coins. Search the portals, they will take you to another dimension!

name: Bio Inc. Nemesis
description: Bio Inc. Nemesis is a free-to-play real-time strategy simulator where you assemble a team of doctors and inflict lethal diseases on hapless patients. Assume control of your very own hospital and recruit doctors from many different medical fields, including modern medicine, alternative treatments, and spiritual healing. Manipulate a patient’s lifestyle and develop risk factors to make them more vulnerable to infection. Terminate the patient before an opposing team of doctors find cures and vaccines to save them!

name: Pizza Brave
description:
Pizza Brave is a fast-paced platform-adventure game in a retro pixelart atmosphere.
Deliver delicious Pizzas across dangerous worlds, while keeping your clients happy!
Pizza Brave combines the adrenaline of action-platformers with the engaging fun of multi-option graphic adventure style dialogs.

name: MidEvil
description: MidEvil is a singleplayer, multiplayer or co-op open world survival RPG that takes place in a vast 20km medieval island setting. Players start shipwrecked on the zombie infested island with nothing. The goals are simple, survive, build, defend!

name: Basketball Showdown 2
description: Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone worldwide in a head-to-head Basketball Showdown!

name: Ghost House Pong
description:
It's Boo-against-Boo in this arcade-style minigame!

- Play Singles or Doubles matches with up to four players.

- Compete across five different courts, each with its own hazards that can be turned on or off.

- Listen to a playlist of classic tracks from the Mario series, as well as other spooky video game tracks.

- USB Controllers are required for doubles matches with 3-4 players.

name: Super Mario Bros 3000
description: Sin descripción

name: Heritage: A Dragon's Tale
description:
It was a day like any other in the Skybound Isles when a dark mass arose from the clouds that separated the forgotten and dangerous world below from the home of the dragons above. General Mechos, a powerful military leader of the humans launched an attack on the floating islands and abducted the dragoness Crystal for reasons unknown.

Flame, a trainee knight and Crystal's best friend, travels to the forgotten kingdom of Mineria having sworn to find her and put an end to whatever plot General Mechos has planned. On his journey, Flame will face incredible dangers, discover more about the kingdom of Mineria, why the dragons were separated from the earth to live in the sky, and discover his own destiny.

name: Super Mario Kart NES
description: Sin descripción

name: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets
description: Tako no Himitsu: Ocean of Secrets is an indie Action RPG made as a tribute to the Game Boy Advance era of gaming. A spiritual successor to Save me Mr Tako, play in a world where Octopuses were erased from history.

name: Space Drilling Station
description: In Space Drilling Station, manage and automate a drilling station on a distant planet. Build a multi-level vertical structure to produce and manage your resources and staff, in order to solve the energy crisis and destroy the competition.

name: Cubzh
description: Play an infinite number of games, create your own items and worlds, and share them with friends. Hang out, compete, and chat in a virtual space where creativity knows no limits.

name: My Virtual Pet Louie the Pug
description:
Welcome to virtual pet games pug life, y'all! My Virtual Pet Dog Louie the Pug is the most charming virtual dog out there, the new virtual pet royalty. Adopt this virtual puppy dog now and let him make your day every time you meet with him. Louie the Pug is not a talking dog. He's a virtual puppy dog that will stick his tongue out and be cool.

Your virtual dog needs to be taken care of – feed him, take him out to pee, bathe him, and play with him. Dog dress-up games are what Louie the Pug really enjoys, so play pet dog games with him and make him the most swag virtual dog out there!

name: Pregnant Talking Cat Emma
description:
Emma the Cat and Oscar are expecting little kittens! Wonderful, right? Too bad Oscar had to go so far away to hunt, so pregnant talking cat Emma is all alone now. Thankfully, she has you! You’ll help your virtual kitty cat Emma go through her pregnancy, right? We all know that’s not easy and Pregnant Talking Cat Emma misses Oscar so much! She is so lonely without him, and she can really use some company and support. Be there for your pregnant virtual cat Emma, and help her prepare to be a mom! Play this virtual pet pregnant game and be the biggest support for your pregnant Emma!

As talking cat Emma is about to have three little talking kitties, she's going to need all the care a pregnant cat can get. Play talking cat pregnant games in order to take this pregnant mommy cat to her doctor so that the kitty cat virtual pet can do an ultrasound and other check-ups. Make sure her talking kitties are safe and sound.
